name: Diablo IV: Vessel of Hatred
description:
The battle against Hatred has only just begun.
Journey into the new region of Nahantu in search of Neyrelle, who is both suffering the fate of her choice to imprison the Prime Evil Mephisto, and seeking a means to destroy him.
Become the apex predator of the jungle as the all-new Spiritborn class. Recruit Mercenaries to aid you in combat, fight together in a new PvE co-op activity, & more.

name: Hearthstone: Showdown in the Badlands
description: The Bloodrock Mining Company found powerful Azerite in the Badlands. They’re digging deep and bleeding the land dry, disrupting the Badlands and awakening slumbering elementals! Now mysterious outlaws are riding into town to set things right. Tumbleweeds roll by and high noon looms. Grab your horse and your hat, it’s nearly time for a Showdown in the Badlands

name: Warcraft Rumble: Season 1
description: The launch season for Warcraft Rumble, adding a new mini.

name: World of Warcraft: Cataclysm Classic
description: The World-changing Cataclysm arrives in World of Warcraft Classic, with changes made from the original release based on fan feedback.

name: World of Warcraft Classic: Season of Discovery
description: Seasonal content arrives to World of Warcraft Classic, adding new playstyles to previous classes, reimagined instances, new PvP areas, and more.

name: World of Warcraft: The War Within
description:
Journey through never-before-seen subterranean worlds filled with hidden wonders and lurking perils, down to the dark depths of the nerubian empire, where the malicious Harbinger of the Void is gathering arachnid forces to bring Azeroth to its knees.

Deep beneath the surface lies treasure vaults waiting to be discovered with Delves. Explore these world instances solo or with up to four friends, along with an NPC companion, to defeat bosses and gain epic end-game loot.

Expand the potential of your alternate characters with account-wide progression across your family of characters on your Battle.net account with Warbands. Share your Warband Bank access, War Within Renown, achievements, collections, and more.

Rise to new heights of power with new Hero Talent trees. Each class specialization has access to two choices of self-contained Hero Talent trees inspired by iconic Warcraft universe archetypes.

name: World of Warcraft: Midnight
description: The second of three announced expansions of the Worldsoul Saga.

name: World of Warcraft: The Last Titan
description: The third of three announced expansions of the Worldsoul Saga.

name: Power Rangers: Lightspeed Rescue
description: This game features the main five Rangers as playable characters with the Titanium Ranger as an extra unlockable character. The game can be played as one or two player mode and also features voice clips by the actual Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue actors and actresses. Once chosen, the player/players stay as the chosen ranger/rangers for the whole game. For the Megazord Battle, the player on controller one can use the Supertrain Megazord. For the final stage, it's replaced with the Omega Megazord. Another special feature for the game is a password system, where special cheat codes can give the rangers infinite health, lives, continues and powered up attacks, as well as access to an art and picture gallery, the option to begin the game on any of the first six of the seven levels and the Titanium Ranger. The Final stage of the game can only be accessed if the player saves the game on the PlayStation Memory Card after completing the penultimate one.

name: Boombot
description: Boombot is a physics-based puzzle game where players are tasked with guiding the titular character through diverse levels using explosives. The game requires players to strategically position and explode bombs to propel Boombot towards the exit, all the while steering clear of obstacles and pitfalls.

name: Power Rangers: Lightspeed Rescue
description:
Game that puts the player in the position of controller of a DataZord (zords that form the Mega DataZord in Lightspeed Rescue). Be one of the rangers and interact with the DataZord panels.

Originally it was released on 6 CDs, bundled in complete with Power Rangers figure toys (one CD for each figure).

name: FreeJack Online
description: FreeJack is a classic free-to-play multiplayer parkour racing game.

name: Sharp Things
description: Single map for Ultimate Doom created for the first Battle of the Bits Doom compo. In this spectacular adventure, you must wage a one-man war against a thorn bush in your backyard that happens to accidentally contain a portal to spiky hell. Time to break out the metaphorical weed whacker!

name: Endless Torture
description: 36 maps with various difficulties by the French Doom community.

name: Selfish Series
description: Selfish Series (Boom Edition) (bselfish.wad) is a compilation of seven maps of varying styles for Doom II, created by Paul Corfiatis.

name: Angmngthoo
description: a single map with brutalist style architecture

name: Grungy Grotto
description: A quake themed map

name: Malleable Intent
description: All is not well within the confines of the UAC, but what else is new. Hidden high atop a remote plateau, sinister machinations unfurl themselves inside this facility's walls. The demonic threat is present once again, but this time it seems that someone at the top was keeping fevered secrets well before their arrival. What price did they pay for progress? You'll have to procure your answers, and your equipment, on-site, but nothing should prove too elusive for a seasoned hellwalker like yourself. Leave no stone unturned, no evil unpurged, and dismantle the mechanisms behind this malleable intent.

name: A Stygian Anguish
description: The hellspawn spilled out of the UAC's hidden plateau base in a deluge of blood and fire, but that was only the beginning. It's clear now that the perpetuating evil took advantage of the Director's malleable intent; otherwise the assumption is that the UAC actually had the hubris to meddle with those otherworldly forces when the inevitable outcome has been laid bare time and again. As you step into the cargo lift and descend into the depths of the caverns beneath the plateau, you wonder what was worth burying under all this rock and stone. If the malice you faced to get here was just scratching the surface, what lies in wait in the darkness below? You steel yourself for what is to come, for anything given this much effort to conceal can result in nothing less than A Stygian Anguish.

name: Lightpath
description: This map is somewhat inspired by two sets with a sun in their names. A highly detailed and difficult map with over 65,000 linedefs.

name: Galine
description: Jdagenet's first map in boom format.

name: Bromine
description: Somewhat large Limit-Removing level

name: Bichiro in a Cave
description: Bichiro, don't go there!

name: Novis
description: Novis is a standard, medium sized hell leveI designed in just under a month from scratch.

name: Peaky Blinders: The King's Ransom - Complete Edition
description: Prove you have what it takes to join the Peaky Blinders in The King's Ransom, a narrative VR game inspired by the epic gangster drama. Complete with all DLC included – including 7 additional missions and challenges!

name: Moto Highway: Racing Speed Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: CodeRed: Battle for Earth
description: Standalone 3D first-person shooter running on Quake II's engine. Your mission is to defend the earth from the alien invasion and to discover the URF commanders secrets.

name: DarkGems
description: DarkGems is a cartoony mining rogue-lite game set in the deep gemstone caverns. Journey through three randomly generated map kinds filled with zombies, ghosts and demons. Keep an eye on your rapidly ending energy supply - one cannot survive in the dark dungeon without a light.

name: CodeRed: The Martian Chronicles
description: The Martian Chronicles is an expansion pack for CodeRED: Battle for Earth. Compared to Battle for Earth, The Martian Chronicles features several new enemies, improvements to the AI and graphics, and the level design is generally aimed at more intense, fast-paced, combat-oriented action.

name: Our Guest Tonight
description:
Presenting a new late show... Our Guest Tonight!
Hosted by Jack! And our guest tonight is… Bob?!
Play as the audience in this brand-new Late Show. Show your support for Bob by spamming the Clap Button, and share your thoughts about Jack by spamming the Boo button.
Be careful! Everyone loves Bob. By not clapping, you might hurt his feelings, and the show might not go well. As for Jack, he's too cocky to be a host, so make sure to humble him down!

name: Dawn of Darkness
description: A fantasy themed total conversion for Quake II, developed around 1999, never officially released but surfaced somewhen in 2016.

name: Scudhead
description: This episode comprises five Plutonia maps which were originally submitted to FDTWID, mostly dating back to 2017. They include some balancing and progression changes to better tie them together as a standalone set.

name: Aspect of Daedalus
description: Aspect of Daedalus is a single map WAD consisting of a medium-sized run and gun/adventure style map. This is designed to play as a vanilla-style map with a moderate difficulty.

name: Atolladero
description: A single map with enough detail to make things interesting, along with different combat situations, from long range to close quarters.

name: Boom Stick in the Mud
description: An unapologetically brown new map. Hellspawn have overrun UAC's high tech sewage treatment plant. Now feces and piss pour out of the compound at a supernatural rate. It's up to DoomGuy to clear out the facility before the entire world is covered in excrement.

name: Crepitations
description: Old town, autumn season recreation.

name: GottaGoFast
description:
The goal with this project was to ﻿create a set of maps that one could UV MAX in a reasonable amount of time, hence the name. Scythe was the main source of influence.
One day you're at home watching TV when you sud﻿denly need to take a shit. You go to the bathroom to discover that you're out of toilet paper, so you decide to go to the store to get some. When you get to the store, you find out that it's crawling with demons. Looks like Hell has invaded. Again. You grab your pistol and go on yet another ridiculous adventure.

name: Hell On Earth Shareware
description: HOE Shareware is an attempt to imagine what a DOOM II shareware episode would have looked like, had the sequel followed a more traditional chapter-based style. It was made to be a cloudy miasma of the DOOM II I always saw in my head based on back-of-the-box description and strategy guide flavor text.

name: Linux Jank
description: A collection of maps that are short, sweet, and to the point. This wad is called Linux Jank as a reference to my learning all the strange quirks of Eureka Editor.

name: Unfamiliar
description: Unfamiliar is a mapping project based around re-imagining the original Doom's maps. Some maps are quickly discernible and others have been reworked extensively to the point of only having a handful of recognizable areas. Maps are designed for standalone gameplay, both continuous or pistol starting.

name: Vanilla Wafers
description: A collection of 6 vanilla-compatible Doom 2 maps that are short, sweet, and to the point

name: Turbo Trio
description: Released on a physical copy by Elephant Entertainment (a division of THQ), this compilation brings together all of the Turbo games in one CD rom.

name: Monopoly City
description: Monopoly City is a new imagination of the classic Monopoly board game. Play alone against the computer or against your friends in this new property builder title. Build houses, industrial complexes, skyscrapers and dominate your competition to become the ultimate winner.

name: Oh No, My Moustache!
description:
An arcade, vertical shoot 'Em up where you play as Fred, a barman of a wild west saloon.
But… Oh no, some stranger robots have appeared out of nowhere, equipped with razors and apparently they want to… cut your fabulous moustache?
That can't happen. So you must defend yourself, avoiding them to get close to you throwing them the only thing that you have, shots of tequila.
Survive as long as you can. The more robots you kill, the stronger they get and the more they will come after you. Each robot eliminated will grant you some points, try to get the highest score!

name: Video Poker
description:
A 5-card poker game for Arduboy ported from the Gamebuino version.

During the bet round, use Up or Down to increase or decrease your bet. The minimum bet is $5 and the maximum is $100. Press B to deal the cards. Select cards using Left or Right. Press A to toggle Hold on the selected card. Press B to exchange unheld cards for new ones from the deck.

name: Space Invaders by Copper France
description:
This is Space Invaders for the Amstrad CPC!
Keyboard left and right arrows are used to move the laser and SPACE to fire.
The goal is to defeat wave after wave of descending aliens to earn as many points as possible.

name: Kong
description:
Rescue the Fay Ray from the Clutches of Kong while avoiding the Barrels below.

This type-in game was published as a listing in the book The Amstrad Games Book, from Pitman Publishing. The game was written by Mark RAMSHAW.

name: Kinkey Dong
description:
This Donkey Kong clone is published as a type-in listing in the book “Sensational Games for the Amstrad CPC 464”. The book was published by Collins and Jim Gregory wrote the game.

The game also a re-pumping published as a type-in listing in the Greek magazine Pixel n° 47 - September 1988, with Stathis SDRALIS and Petros ATHANASIOU handling the re-pumping.

In 2019, a revised and improved version was released as a homebrew release.

name: Cracky
description:
The game is cleared when all the stars are taken.

The cracked floor disappears when you pass over it, so you can only pass through it once.

name: Guitar Hero: Brazucas
description: Modified version of Guitar Hero III that features songs from Brazilian bands, such as Capital Inicial, Pitty, Charlie Brown Jr. and Mamonas Assassinas.

name: Mafia II DLC: Vegas Pack
description: Bring a taste of old school Vegas to Empire Bay as you cruise through the town in 2 new cars with smooth handling and timeless lines. Vito shows his Vegas style in 2 new suits inspired by the period.

name: Game Tree
description: In this shooting game the player is equipped with a hunting rifle in order to shoot turkeys, rabbits and squirrels.

name: Desert Patrol
description: Combat shooting game.

name: Supermarket Security Simulator
description:
Welcome to your first day of work at our supermarket.
I know this is your first time working security so listen up.

As security you will have to:
Keep an eye on people so they don't steal, which entails searching old ladies, keep an eye out for gypsies (and not so gypsies) stealing from you.
If a thief tries to flee, don't be afraid to hit him with the truncheon or electrocute him with the taser. Check the ticket and if he has something he didn't buy you handcuff him and put him in the dungeon.
Check the security cameras, which will alert you if they detect someone stealing. They are shitty and sometimes fail, you will have to hit them with the broom to fix them...
Watch out for the trolleys, the old ladies are trying to take them home.
Kids are bastards... Some of them come to eat whatever they want and then they leave the packages empty.
They often come to rob the supermarket, so be alert and when you see a robber you neutralize him with a punch.
You will also have to work at night so don't be afraid and if some robbers come you can shoot them.

name: Mafia II DLC: War Hero Pack
description: The 40s wouldn’t be complete without a war hero. Vito plays the role well in the War Hero DLC pack. Drive 2 military style vehicles and notice the superior handling in all weather conditions. Vito looks sharp in 2 new military inspired suits, including a full uniform and fatigues.

name: Mafia II DLC: Greaser Pack
description: The Mafia II Greaser DLC pack is all about speed. These 2 new hot-rod speedsters will have you outrunning the police every time. Pair that with 2 new suits for Vito, one with leather jacket and heavy boots, the other a leather racing suit, and get ready to start your engines.

name: Mafia II DLC: Renegade Pack
description: Show off your inner renegade in this new DLC pack. Start with 2 new cars, one with the slick styling and tight handling of a small sports coupe and the other with the revved up engine of a 50s hot rod. Outfit Vito in 2 new suits including leather and lettermen’s jackets to fit his renegade persona.

name: Mafia II DLC: Made Man Pack
description:
The Made Man Pack offers two new "Made Man" suits for Vito to wear and two new cars. Get a taste of being a Made Man in this exclusive Collector's Edition pack. Feel the difference of a luxury automobile as you drive two classics, modeled after cars from the period featuring bold design and dynamic performance. Vito will look the part in two new suits including a red carpet worthy tux.

The cars included in the pack are the Cossack and the Roller GL300. The suits are the Made Man suit with sunglasses and the Tuxedo with bow tie. Both outfits come in five color combinations.

name: Wreck League
description:
Wreck League reigns as an unrivaled battleground, where the most powerful mechs you can create clash with others’ fighters in an unforgiving competition of skill and dominance. Build your mech, sharpen your abilities in training mode, then face the ultimate challenge in scheduled TOURNAMENTS and EVENTS against other mech owners across the globe. Rise to supremacy and unlock prized on-chain rewards.

Unleash your mechs in real-time player-versus-player combat. With seamless cross-play functionality, the action transcends devices, allowing you to compete on mobile, PC, or Mac.

Unleash powerful moves by deploying your loadout of action cards, which manifests randomly in battle. Each action costs a different amount of energy to execute, so manage your loadout accordingly–with strategic timing, you can inflict devastating combo attacks.

name: Pocket Player: Dig Dug
description: The Dig Dug Pocket Player is one of many collectible handheld game consoles by My Arcade. Fygars, Pookas, and falling rocks. Join Dig Dug on the ultimate adventure to vanquish underground monsters. Making his first appearance in Japan in 1982, the airpump wielding hero has since become an arcade legend. My Arcade Pocket Players are portable handheld gaming systems for kids and adults alike. They feature high quality artwork inspired by original arcade machines and are boxed in collectible packaging that can be displayed in homes and offices. Fully playable and perfect for fans of retro gaming, Pocket Players feature 2.75 inch full color displays, front facing speakers with volume controls, and headphone jacks. They are powered via micro USB or 4 AAA batteries, which are not included. These handhelds are compact and easy to take along for offline gaming sessions in long car rides, road trips, airplane flights, train rides, and more.

name: Pocket Player Pro: Mega Man
description:
This officially licensed title includes Mega Man 1-6!

Mega Man is the iconic blue bomber who has been delighting fans for over 30 years. Mega Man is one of the most popular video game franchises of all time. The Mega Man series has sold over 38 million units worldwide. With his ability to absorb the powers of his enemies, Mega Man is a force to be reckoned with.

Battle your way through challenging levels, defeat powerful bosses, and save the world from Dr. Wily's evil plans.

name: Atari Mini Arcade
description: An officially licensed collectable retro mini arcade featuring the legendary Centipede and 4 other amazing games! Adventure, Sprint Master, Gravitar and Yars' Revenge offer you true retro gaming from the start of a global revolution. Experience the classics and collect the range.

name: Retro-Bit Generations
description:
Bring the power and entertainment of an arcade to your living room with the Retro-Bit Generations Plug and play console. Since 2007, Retro-Bit has been at the forefront of the retro gaming world, introducing innovative and exciting platforms to re-experience a treasured vintage gaming era.

Features:

Continuing with that tradition, Retro-Bit Generations is packed with over 100 popular retro titles from world-renowned pioneer videogame developers that brought you Super Ghouls 'n Ghosts, Kid Niki Radical Ninja, Gun.Smoke, Captain Commando, Kickle Cubicle, Super R-Type, Knights of the Round, Brawl Brothers, Ring King and more!

Revisit and replay these classics on your own or with a friend with two retro-style six button controllers, for an authentic retro re-experience. Designed with a sleek user-friendly interface and an HDMI port, Retro-Bit Generations brings a new look for the old school gamer and delivers fun for all ages!

name: The A500 Mini
description:
Now other classic consoles are just toys!

Introducing THEA500 Mini, a compact reimagining of this classic home computer. Featuring perfect emulation of not only the original A500 (OCS) and Enhanced Chip Set (ECS) of future revisions, but also the Advanced Graphics Architecture (AGA) of the A1200. Play one of the included 25 classic Amiga games, selected from a simple to use carousel, including all-time greats like Alien Breed 3D, Another World, Simon the Sorcerer and Worms. Or side-load your own games via USB stick with full WHDLoad support and an array of options to choose from. Plus save and resume your game at any time to help you finish those punishingly difficult classics.

The THEA500 Mini comes with the original style 2-button mouse and newly engineered 8-button precision gamepad, allowing you to choose your control method. To compliment the on-screen keyboard, you can plug in an external standard USB PC keyboard for additional functionality.

name: Chess for Idiots
description: Chess for idiots - a discipline of intellectual sport, invented and initiated by Ozjasz Goldberg. Seemingly chess for idiots resembles regular chess. The game is played on the same board using the same pieces. However, this is where the similarities end, because everything that would discriminate intellectually against players was eliminated from the rules. Therefore, there are practically no rules, and players can make any move with any pieces and capture any number of opponent's pieces. The victory is determined by the IQ (the lower, the greater the chances of winning) and the decision of Ozjasz Goldberg.

name: Inglorious
description:
Nihil is in danger. Only the champions of the Gods can save the realm of the dead. However, no one said they have to work together to achieve it.

Compete with your friends to see who is better at eliminating waves of enemies in Multiplayer mode! Control the champion you like most and be the first to defeat the final Boss to win!

Use your enemies' souls to improve your champion or to obstruct your opponent without having to use your weapons!

In Single Player mode, battle to conquer and defend the territories of Nihil from the terrible enemy army!

Glory is for the living and you are no longer one of them.

name: Balance of Superpower
description: Balance of Superpower is a 67,000-word interactive sci-fi romance novel by Rustem Khafizov. It’s entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects. Play as a superpowered person at an academy for people like you in Washington, D.C., in 2075.

name: Magicraft
description: "Magicraft" is a Roguelike game that uses a variety of spells to match unimaginable spell effects, and the construction of ultra-high degrees of freedom cannot even be exhausted by developers.

name: Death by AI
description: Step into a world where AI holds all the cards. Will it be your ally, or will it pull the plug? Choose wisely, because it's not programmed to care! Death by AI is an online prompt based survival multiplayer game to play with your friends, family, community and coworkers on mobile and web.

name: Desktop Explorer
description:
Desktop Explorer is an exploration-puzzle game set in a retro-style operating system. Solve puzzles by interacting with built-in software features, immersing yourself into a realistic late 90’s computer experience.

The game follows a fairly innocent narrative as you progress through it’s puzzles. However it becomes clear to you that there is more than meets the eye with this machine, as you slowly see its familiar façade fade away in favor of a darker aesthetic..

name: MiniJolt
description: Play through 11 unique minigames made by members of the Game Jolt community! Can you beat them all?

name: Five Nights at Freddy’s Abandoning
description: Sin descripción

name: Catacomb Chase
description: Embark on an intense, underground adventure. As you maneuver through intricate mazes, avoiding obstacles, discovering hidden riches, and staying ahead of relentless foes, will you secure your spot at the top of the leaderboards?

name: XOP Black Ultra
description: XOP Black Ultra is an extensive update to XOP Black, a 2D arcade-style vertical shoot-em-up, with more levels of crazy bullet hell gameplay, more extra game modes, and even more enemies and giant bosses to blow up!

name: Faith Update v1.4: Good Christian Boy
description:
Praise the Unspeakable! One year after the release of Faith: The Unholy Trinity, it's time for a new challenge! In the new Survival mode, fight through an all-new environment facing every last demon we can throw at you. Can you escape with your life...and get the highest rank?

This v1.4 update includes the new Survival mode, a new hidden mode (!), new animated cutscenes, a new background to unlock, a brand-new music track, and more...tis

name: Bill Rambeard's Rad Bad Blasterball
description:
In this block breaker game inspired by 1976's Breakout, you play as Bill Rambeard at the heights of his powers competing in the fast-paced, razzle-dazzle world of Blasterball.

Bill is joined by a cast of characters who will help you along by playing polka as you break through the procedural-generated puzzles. Your only goal is to get the highest score you can!

name: Crazy Hit 2
description:
Crazy Hit 2 is an unlicensed Whack-A-Mole style game for the PlayStation featuring Pokémon characters.

The game originally came with a pop'n music-style peripheral called Crazy Hit, manufactured by U.F.O. Soft (who also created the Photo Hunter games), as the game was intended for use with the peripheral (the peripheral also came with two discs specially designed for it; Crazy Hit 1, the other disc, is currently undumped); however, the game could also be played with a normal controller. Possibly due to the branding, Pokémon Crazy Hit 2 were later independently released by bootleggers separately from the peripheral.

Due to the homebrew nature of the game, the title is very small by PlayStation standards, weighing at just 5 MB.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs.Tails Doll
description: After BF founds his old Sega saturn he decides to play oone of the few games he has. untill he encounters a familiar but creepy foe after breaking a seal on the game.

name: Famicom Tantei Club: Seinaru Yoru ni
description: A japanese fan game for the Famicom Detective Club series made for PCs.

name: Simply Phobos
description: Simply Phobos (pe1_phob.wad) is an episode 1 replacement for Ultimate Doom by Paul Corfiatis in the style of Knee-Deep in the Dead, with a bonus secret level in the style of Inferno by Kristian Aro. It also includes a custom soundtrack by Paul Corfiatis.

name: Domino Club
description: The eponymous Domino Club game is a pixel art, menu-driven visual novel where you play as a detective inspired by the game catalogue of the Domino Club group members.

name: Super Obama World
description: Super Obama World is a parody 2D platformer based on former president Barack Obama. The game is heavily based on Super Mario World.

name: Disney Frozen: Arendelle’s Winter Festival
description: Enjoy an enchanted celebration throughout Arendelle with Anna, Elsa and Olaf. Children use mathematics skills in active game play to toss snowballs, create beautiful ice sculptures, collect magical snowflakes and trace a path on the ice rink.

name: Dusk Till Dawn
description: Dusk Till Dawn is a Friday Night Funkin' mod featuring a corrupted version of Twilight Sparkle facing off against Boyfriend & Pibby.

name: Mini Arcade Game
description: Mini Arcade Game is a compilation LCD game released by Out of the Blue featuring 8 built in games.

name: Peaceland
description: Point-and-click game distributed by BNN, based on the original work by picture book writer Jun Takabatake. Each scene in the game unfolds like a narrated storybook, with clickable elements for new animations and music.

name: Horror Game
description: Short and (hopefully) spooky bad trip

name: The Last Note From Dad
description: A short horror experience on a supposedly uninhabited island.

name: Suika Game Demake
description: Everyone's favorite Watermelon Game for PICO-8. Drop fruits and merge fruits that are alike.

name: Meet Your Oshi
description: It's your chance to meet your oshis -- all you have to do is survive the night! Five of them to be exact. Utilize point-and-click mechanics to assess cameras and maintain a printer that will DEFINITELY print a ticket -- eventually! Work to conserve power but be careful. Those oshis are just as eager to meet you and they hug really hard.

name: Top Racer Mini Arcade
description: TopRacer, the SNES classic racing game, was originally released in 1993 with a soundtrack by Barry Leitch. This realistic racer game PIKO Interactive includes 64 racing tracks in 16 countries. The mini arcade features a steering wheel, and the objective is to become the fastest driver in the race with your choice of several cars.

name: Darkland 2
description:
A cosmic cloud has shrouded the land in permanent darkness. Red death rains like blood. Monsters from beyond lurk in the shadows, spawning their evil offspring. Fight them with light and fire, find a sanctuary. Survive this unholy night.

The controls guide the player character, and a flashlight that illuminates the ground ahead. Press fire to use the gun. Gunfire will only strike an illuminated spot, or at close point-black range near the player character. If you let the monsters or their firepower hit the player character you will lose a life. A bonus life is awarded for every 10,000 points.

name: Compilation of 10 Line Basic games
description:
Find 2 exclusive games coded in 10 lines of Basic Locomotive!

They demonstrate the power and effectiveness of this fabulous Basic and its Text mode!

name: Le Chat Fonce
description: Join Le Chat, the agile feline, as he dashes through vibrant landscapes, overcoming obstacles and collecting fireflies along the way.

name: Hebereke: Rescue O-Chan
description:
In this hack, you play as Hebe from the Hebereke game series. He goes on a short adventure to rescue one of his friends, O-Chan, who was kidnapped by the Muu Cat.

This hack has 5 levels, and it was an entry for the SMB Jam, which got 2nd place, with 11.5 out of 25 points (first place got 15, and another entry got 16.5, but said entry would not go under winners).

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Acceleracers Expansion pack
description:
Discover the most secretive underground racing arena in the world of Hot Wheels, where the Teku and Metal Maniacs train to compete in the World Race.

Welcome to the AcceleDrome! Inside Dr Tezla’s headquarters, you can experience all the thrills of racing and the adventures of AcceleRacers, a real treat for all the fans of the series! An immense space that combines the mysterious charm of a gigantic cave with state-of-the-art technological solutions, featuring a holographic Wheel of Power at its centre, dominating the scene.

Explore all the secrets of this new environment aboard Rat-ified, the powerful rat-rod of the Metal Maniacs, Chicane, the high-tech muscle car of the Teku team, Spine Buster, the roaring supercar of Mark Wylde, or Vert’s, the high-performance car of the legendary Vert Wheeler.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Honda Modern Classics
description: Enrich your collection with four iconic vehicles that come straight from the land of the Rising Sun! 1990 Honda Civic EF, 2018 Honda Civic Type R, 1985 Honda City Turbo II and 2022 Honda Super Cub bring the best of the Japanese scene to the track. As the name of the pack suggests, these modern vehicles from Honda have become instant classics. Lightweight and aerodynamic, perfect for drifting on the streets of Tokyo and on the tracks you’ll create thanks to powerful engines and extraordinary performance. Special mention for 2022 Honda Super Cub, proof that 4 wheels are not always needed to have fun on the track. Use its agility to weave through traffic and wheelie towards the finish line! Add Honda Modern Classics Pack to your collection!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Made In Italy Expansion Pack
description:
Among roof tiles, bricks, and stones, get ready to show everyone what you’re made of with the Made in Italy Expansion Pack!

This DLC includes:
- 1 Environment to build your tracks: Italian Village
- 4 Vehicles: Alfa Romeo 155 V6 TI, Lancia 037, Fiat 500D Modificado, Vespa 90 SS Super Sprint (1966)
- 1 new area to add to the Hot Wheels Creature Rampage mode
- Background, Profile icon, Tag and Card Background to further customise your Unleashed Profile!

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gyakuten
description: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gyakuten (涼宮ハルヒの逆転, The Turnabout of Haruhi Suzumiya) is a Japanese doujin game made by CUBETYPE and released in 2006. Its gameplay is based on the Ace Attorney series.

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gyakuten 2+1
description: A Japanese doujin game made by CUBETYPE and released in 2007. It is a sequel to their previous title, Suzumiya Haruhi no Gyakuten. The gameplay is based on the Ace Attorney series. As the name implies, this game came packaged with all the cases from the first game as well.

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gyakuten 3
description: a Japanese doujin game made by CUBETYPE and released in 2008. It's gameplay is based on the Ace Attorney series , and is the final game in the Suzumiya Haruhi no Gyakuten series.

name: Super Mario World Redone
description:
Super Mario World Redone is a hack that aims to create much nicer visuals for the original Super Mario World, while adding some new features, secrets and an all new encore mode!
The game also includes new custom music and lots of bugfixes for the original game.

As a bonus, there are four new levels for you to find, and they are very well hidden! Can you find them?

name: Multiplicity
description:
Did you know that there are more stars in the sky than grains of sand on Earth? I know, it sounds crazy. But it's true!

A short cosmic horror tale, inspired by the classics of survival horror.

name: Crazy Hit
description:
Crazy Hit is a game produced by U.F.O. Soft that was released together with Crazy Hit 2 (known as the Playstation Pokémon for using unlicensed art from the franchise) and a special controller to play both.

It is currently not possible to find the game or recordings of it available, so the only image of it available is the one on the back of the set's box. From the box art and the description on it (in addition to the use of the controller), it is possible to deduce that it shares the same gameplay as Crazy Hit 2 (a whack-a-mole like game), but without the use of Pokémon.

In Crazy Hit 2 it is possible to see on the initial screen that the game was made by Poho and Majorros, however without the file for this game, it is uncertain to say that this game was also produced by both developers.

name: Sil-Q
description: Sil-Q is a computer role-playing game with a strong emphasis on discovery and tactical combat. It has a simple but rich combat system which allows for a great variety of choice.

name: Sonic Superstars: Lego Sonic Skin
description: Speed through the world of SONIC SUPERSTARS as the Blue Blur, now in LEGO form!

name: OpenGoal: Jak II
description: Fan made PC port of Jak II, with more options, like the ones added to The Precursor Legacy, such as antialiasing, resolution, screen ratios and more to be added.

name: Fortnite: Drakon Steel Hybrid Crew Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Goddess of Wisdom
description:
The Legend of Zelda: Goddess of Wisdom follows the original design of ‘Zelda3 Goddess of Wisdom’ but is edited to create a more comprehensive experience for novice and/or expert players that feels akin to something Nintendo would release.

This hack built upon the framework created in ‘Zelda3 Goddess of Wisdom’ with all due respect to the original author(s), and is made to correct some of the issues observed in the final ‘Zelda3 Goddess of Wisdom’ release.

name: Black Diamond
description: Black Diamond is a set of 5 boom-compatible maps set in the cavernous void of the sea. Uncover a forgotten civilization on your quest for the Black Diamond, a mystical artifact said to let its bearer see beyond death.

name: Zen 2212 A.D.
description: A single Doom 2 map, set in a futuristic dystopian city.

name: Mega Starforce: Return to the Great Star
description: The attackers from outer space are back. This time, however, they are stronger and tactically better prepared to bring the world one step closer to its doom. Practically, this means blasting everything movable into little pieces and collecting bonus items. In higher levels, the enemies become faster and more aggressive. At the same time, their bombing frequency also increases. There are also several different enemies that break away from the formations and attack the player.

name: Yami no Koe
description: A group of six people--two teachers, two male and two female students--rents a yacht, only to find a stowaway, a girl named Tachikawa Nanami. Shortly after, violent seas wreck their ship and force them ashore an island. What are the intentions of the beautiful woman named Sayoko and her maid K, who offer them shelter in her mansion until the ferry arrives in 30 days? What are Nanami's intentions? Time is running out.

name: Disconcerting Unease 1
description: Weekend-long impromptu speedmapping session: four around medium-sized metal levels.

name: Moonlight Assault
description: Very large interconnected medieval castle with yards and outside areas - semi-nonlinear, explorational kind of gameplay.

name: Clean Cut
description: Medium-sized idbase industrial facility with tight corridors, glass windows and pipes.

name: The Brutalist Volumes
description: Enter a Quake world of pure concrete, minimalist structures, and eldritch horror. What started as just a map for QBJ2 got out of hand and became a standalone episode.

name: Snack Pack 3: Trick or Treat
description: In the third installment of the Snack Pack series, mappers came together to contribute maps toward an 8-map Halloween-themed episode, with 3 extra maps in the hub as bonus levels. The pack includes a new 'Penetrator' stake gun weapon, the Rotary Shotgun from Dwell, and the Gaunt from Quoth as well as an updated Copper mod that features new Nightmare mechanics!

name: Explore Jam 3
description: Pack of non combat maps. Some puzzles, some platforming and a lot of exploration! In comparison with 2 previous Explore jam packs this one is leaning toward walking simulators with a lot of environmental storytelling.

name: Explore Jam 1
description: Two small maps made over two days. Gameplay is experimental and focuses solely on exploration and finding the way to progress. There are no monsters and no serious threats to the player.

name: Disconcerting Unease 2
description: Four small to medium-sized spooky Halloween maps: an arctic outpost, a Q2-textured mining complex, a pumpkin spice latte franchise place, and an infinite horde arena. Comes with a few new features, a custom skybox and new sounds.

name: Explore Jam 2
description: Second "explore" map jam - featuring five smallish levels in different themes and with experimental gameplay. No combat; instead, the focus is on exploration and solving puzzles or discovering secrets. The pack comes with two skyboxes, custom medieval-style item visuals, and the map sources are included.

name: Karoshi Mario
description: This is Karoshi Mario, based off of the original game by Jesse Venbrux. In case you never played Karoshi before, the objective is to kill yourself. That's it. It's harder than it may sound sometimes, though. The objective of this game is not to emulate the original, but to put Mario in a similar type of situation.

name: Mario Superstar
description:
This rom hack only has one level, but it features different mechanics that allow Mario to absorb the powers of some enemies, in a similar way to Kirby.

This rom hack was made to participate in SMW Central's Chocolate Level Design 2010 contest and came in first place.

name: Cosmic Collapse
description: A casual game where it's time to tidy up the solar system. Shove planets into each other to make bigger planets. No stress, take your time. Play strategically to trigger insane combos. Earn missiles to get out of tricky situations. A totally accurate simulation of celestial bodies.

name: The Ninji Saga Part 1: Birth of a Legend
description: A little story from the perspective of one of the more easily forgotten enemies from the Mario series.

name: Line Bender
description: Bend the world around you to complete various puzzles. Unlock block interactions, discover efficient solutions, and escape the dungeon.

name: Help Bipboop
description: Guide Bipboop, the autonomous little robot, through a series of mind-bending puzzles. You don't control Bipboop directly; instead, place terrain blocks strategically to help him reach the end. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Roach Race
description: You wake up in a hostile world, among people unknown to you and your only task is to reach the finish line first.

name: Tactical Rampart
description: Tactical Rampart is a RPG, survival game in which you will become the defender of a rampart from the attack of zombies in outer space. Using guns and towers, could you successfully defeat them?

name: Mindlock: The Apartment
description: Colin’s apartment maze has puzzles, dialogues, and some dry humor waiting for you. A surreal adventure of a special kind.

name: Detective: Minerva Case
description: DETECTIVE Minerva Case is a crime deduction and solving game, with an adult and original story. Visit the crime scene, look for all the evidence and understand what happened.

name: The Line TD
description: In The Line TD, you decide your path and you survive! Plan your strategy, carve your own path, choose your difficulty and survive the longest!

name: Warkestra
description: Warkestra is a voice command survival action game where you can use your own words and voice to command your troops that understand your intentions. Explore castles, tame monsters, build your army, and become the one and only legendary commander.

name: Road to Exotics!
description: Arcade-inspired racing game, Cannon-Style! Race against up to 300 racers simultaneously, A unique perspective on arcade racing.

name: Uknon Jones & Guynelk: Awesome!
description: After a tragedy, Uknon Jones, Guynelk and Elsa decide to meet the doctor Gamma to save their friends. Explore this open world and find all the hidden G-atoms in the world to power the time machine from the doctor to hope to change things!

name: Mighty Knight Legacy
description: Fight your way through hordes of ferocious monsters as the popular web classic 2D action RPG "Mighty Knight" returns with new and enhanced gameplay, HD visuals, and many other cool features!

name: Endless Desert TD
description: Endless Desert TD is a unique blend of tower defense and roguelike gameplay as you strategically defend against diverse waves of enemies. Adapt to survive a challenging world where every playthrough is a new experience.

name: Tang Dynasty Architecture
description: A standalone build game that showcases the structural details of ancient Chinese architecture. I hope to eventually develop into a game for building a complete ancient architectural system, preserving a very interesting electronic version of ancient architecture for future generations.

name: The Lost Detective
description: This is a single-player third-person action-adventure puzzle game that allows players to solve certain puzzles and explore more game content. This game currently only supports computers and can be operated through a keyboard and mouse.

name: Phantom Killer
description: Realistic graphics and graphics: With the power of Unreal Engine 5, we present players with a realistic and detailed game world.

name: Wormswarm
description: Wormswarm is an experimental platformer about jumping on abstract wriggling worms while scoring points.

name: Firefly Witch
description: Fly, fight, and cast spells in this thrilling witch shooter! Save your friends from a mysterious menace using your magical prowess and spells. Become a fearless witch on a high-speed adventure!

name: Blue Bird's Song
description: Blue Bird's Song is an interactive fiction game. Explore this dark fairy tale in a fantasy universe and help Birdie discover the whole story. But don't forget, you have to help her escape the darkness. Are you ready?

name: Dystofarm
description: "Dystofarm" is an exciting sidescroller. Take control of a farmer with unique powers to harvest the souls of mutated creatures and customize your inventory with weapons, shields, and hats. Explore a mysterious world, defeat monsters, and uncover the origins of mutations.

name: Element Are We
description: "ElementAreWe" is an innovative, educational rogue-like deck builder. Explore the periodic table's wonders, engage in card-based battles, and learn while having fun! Perfect for all ages.

name: Liyf
description: Master the art of light and shadow in this unique 2D platformer, controlling both the hero and their shadow to conquer puzzles and foes. A visually stunning, mind-bending adventure awaits!

name: Is This Even Chess?
description: Prove you're worthy of King's Challenge! Master items, navigation, and combat in over 30 levels of increasing difficulty! Many contenders have failed before. Will you be able to defeat King and claim the ultimate prize?

name: Up to Gods
description: Up to Gods is a single-player platformer game known for its unique story and philosophy. In a world where the gods have declared war on humanity. You must navigate the challenging and sin-filled path prepared by the gods to reach them and save the future of humanity.

name: Contingent️
description: A gritty melee RTS game set after the fall of the Roman Empire in Britain.

name: Knowledge Party
description: Quiz game for 2-10 players. Play together and find out who is true Winner!

name: Hide and Seek
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite: Heartbreak Royale Pack
description:
Expunge all feelings with the Heartbreak Royale Pack. Includes an Outfit, Back Bling, Pickaxe and 600 V-Bucks.

V-Bucks included with this purchase can't be transferred to or used on Nintendo Switch.

name: Coin Exchange Craze
description: Exchange coins and reach high scores in this challenging arcade roguelike puzzle game

name: Call of Toys: Tower Defense!
description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey to protect Santa's Valley in this epic Tower Defense game, a 2D strategic Tower Defense game inspired by classic TD games.

Explore an arsenal of 13 unique towers, each equipped with magical spells and exclusive abilities. Customize your towers with numerous upgrades that enhance their strength and unlock new magical powers.

But that's not all! Your towers can be equipped with a variety of items, including armor, helmets, shields, amulets, rings, and an impressive selection of weapons such as swords, axes, hammers, magic wands, and bows.

name: Mirror Floor
description:
Mirror Floor is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to jump between platfroms with coins on them. You score points by picking up the coins but every coin turns you upside down and mirrors your position on the platform. It also changes which sides of the platforms are active. Press a button to jump and hold a button to speed up. You have to think carefully which coins to pick up in order to proceed forward.

The game is over when you fall.

name: A Social Platform
description: Problems at home? Problems at school? No worries. Help out a highschool girl as she explores the wonders of social media for the first time, as well as the dangers.

name: Lucky Mayor
description: This is a Rogue Deck-building game where you play as a mayor, recruit various citizens to earn coins, meet their needs, and submit enough coins by the deadline to complete challenges.

name: Nightwatch: Nightmare Creatures
description: Nightwatch: Nightmare Creatures is a horror game for one or two players. Your task will be to restore and repair the equipment as well... avoiding victims of megacorporation experiments.

name: Sins of Treatment
description: Sins of Treatment is a 3D horror from the first person, everything happens in some liminal spaces. The gameplay consists in collecting information, solving riddles and escaping from various entities. The main goal is to understand what is happening to you, how you got here and who you were before.

name: Blacksmith: Song of Two Kings
description: In this 2D fantasy game you play a role of a blacksmith who literally handcrafts weapons, shields, armor, magic staffs and many other marvellous items.

name: Gridmaster
description: Step into the world of Gridmaster, a high-speed single-player racer. Take on time trials, master the art of drifting, and compete on the leaderboards. As you dominate the road, unlock new cars and tracks to fuel your journey to victory!

name: Tour Manager: Secret Stories
description: Head a travel agency and unravel the mysteries of this city! Hire employees, plan tourist routes, improve the reputation of the agency. Advance through the story to find out what this city is hiding.

name: Runehaven
description: Runehaven is a voxel-based atmospheric first-person roguelike dungeon crawler. Explore eerie, procedurally generated dungeons, battle vile creatures, solve puzzles, discover hidden secrets, and dodge deadly traps in your quest for survival!

name: The Lumenites
description: Build a cozy village and explore the skies on a peaceful turtle's back. Together with your villagers, cleanse floating island of their darkness, upcycle resources, and restore nature's beauty.

name: Moonlight Adventure
description: Moonlight Adventure is a strategy card game, featuring fairy tale-style vertical graphics. Let’s build your deck. In the forest under the moonlight, monsters are infested. The brave man is about to experience a mysterious adventure, exploring the restraint relationship and genre of the deck.

name: Dr. Esereth
description: Solve puzzles as a mad scientist in this action-adventure RPG.

name: Cooling Simulator
description: Cooling simulator! Become CPU cooler! Can you cool down your PC build? Simulation game where player becomes cooler! Cool down the PC, don't make too much noise, don't make the owner angry and keep the temperatures low!

name: Doodle Streets: London 1950's
description: Visit the Fifties & Sixties of the 20th-century London to find hidden things in this interactive, hand-drawn and animated game.

name: Voiceover
description: Voiceover is a single player project for PC made on Unity, Inspired by Disco Elysium and classic JRPGs, where real world through the prism of the main character’s mental disorders.

name: Inner Darkness
description: Inner Darkness is a first-person horror game made in pixelated 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of loneliness. The gameplay consists in walking around locations, solving riddles.

name: Suika Dish
description: Players drop fruits one by one at any time and stack them up. and when two fruits of the same type touch each other, the fruit changes to a larger fruit. Repeat this process to make the fruit bigger, aiming to create the watermelon with the highest score.

name: Abandoned Cabins in the Woods
description: Abandoned Cabins in the Woods is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game based on the story of a paranormal investigator and streamer called Thomas who decided to investigate the haunted Idaho woods for the paranormal evidence upon the request of his fans.

name: Battle Wave
description: Get ready for a world filled with determination, skill, and strategy! Battle Wave calls upon you to survive against waves of incoming enemies and enhance your character.

name: Nephenthesys
description: Blast off on a treacherous mission to recover an unidentified energy source amidst an alien onslaught! Nephenthesys is a vertical scrolling shoot’em up presented in widescreen top-down 3D style.

name: Supurr Cat Cafe: Sandwich Rush
description: Stack towering sandwiches with the help of cute cat friends while building up your dream cat cafe. With plenty of hungry quirky customers around, you’ll need to upgrade your cafe, find new cats to help you and up your sandwich game to keep them happy!

name: The Structureworld: Myths of Skull Island
description: Survive in this epic semi-open world Survival Game on a new interpretation of Skull Island filled with your biggest nightmares! Build small bases, resource holders, traps and barricades to fight off the horrors and the simulated ecosystem of the island.

name: Flashman Gold
description: Flashman Gold he is called because he is a super fast gold smith. Now his gold has been stolen by gold stealing monsters thieves and there is only one thing to do, get the gold back!!! 30 beautiful levels, especially for people who have experienced the 80'.

name: Unwell
description: You regain consciousness. Beside you lies a broken and rusted ladder, and in front of you stretches a dark, damp-smelling corridor. In the distance, you hear the sound of falling water. You have no idea where you are. All you know is that you must go deeper.

name: Invincible Big Cat
description: The last kitten born on the Rat Planet lives in humiliation in a zoo. But the vicious cosmic pirate Dr.Nyan helped you. Now the time for revenge has come! This is a Survivor-like game. You will play as a big cat monster to dismantle the resistance of the rats and destroy their cities.

name: Spent Shells
description: Spent Shells is a high score top-down shooter with roguelike-y randomized elements. Players dive in to an ever-changing dungeon to harvest a crystalized power source that will get them home. Fight through the dungeon using a variety of weapons, characters, upgrades, and your own skill!

name: Stay Up!
description: Stay Up is a 2D roguelike, boss rush game. If you want to feel the feeling of challenge; Take your spear, avoid hitting the walls and defeat the enemies! When you throw your spear you will jump! Avoid hitting the ground using this, but be careful not to hit the ceiling either!

name: United Sects of America
description: Welcome to the United Sects of America, where a captivating narrative, strategic management, and moral choices seamlessly intertwine. As the leader of your own cult, you'll grapple with tough decisions, shape your group's destiny, and aim to wield influence across the entire United States.

name: Deepcut
description: Become king and rule over the eyes and ears of your kingdom.

name: Gamebesh
description: Gamebesh features two classes - Hiders and Hunters. Hiders can transform into various objects (like chairs, TVs, and more) while Hunters hunt for them. Both classes receive a special ability each round.

name: Dear Flower
description: Dear Flower is a point and click adventure game. You can experience the story with hand-drawn animation and cutscenes.

name: RODB: Rhythm of Deck Builder
description: Let your heart and body dance to the rhythm! A groovy nonstop card game. The world's first Roguelike Deckbuilder that combines "Rhythm Game" and "Card Game"!

name: Clash of the Elements
description: Wield the elements to compose the music in real time by battling your friends! Choose among the proposed maps, unite and combine the elements to create your unique mix, reflecting the process of fierce battle in abstract 2D space.

name: Space Killer
description: "Space Killer" Battle for the Universe in a Super Hit Looter Arcade with roguelike elements.

name: No Case Should Remain Unsolved
description: Twelve years after Senior Inspector Jeon Gyeong's retirement, she is visited by a young police officer: a woman who pleads with her to reexamine Seowon's case. But with each uncovered memory, only one thing becomes clear: everyone in Seowon's vicinity was lying.

name: Changdong's Bikini Adventure
description: Adventure of finding a bikini with Changdong! Enjoy fun games with online update technology combined with the latest 3D graphics!

name: Chimeras: Price of Greed - Collector's Edition
description: People are disappearing left and right in the Carrington Mansion. But who's behind it, how are they doing it, and most importantly, what are they hiding?

name: Legend of the Wargod
description: A dark fantasy epic RPG with turn-based combat, with an emphasis on strategy and survival. Aid Zieg in his quest to recover his stolen voice and unfold the Legends of Aeasyn.

name: Alien Tag
description: Alien Tag is an free, immersive VR game that puts you in the shoes of an extraterrestrial trying to tag other aliens!

name: Multiplayer Cavemen
description: Multiplayer Cavemen - The Village is being taken over by DinoSaurs. Can You and your Pack Survive ?

name: Pelagos: A Marine Adventure
description: Dive into Pelagos: Snap, Learn & Explore Marine Ecosystems!

name: Hero Manager
description: Hero Manager is a management game featuring auto-battler. Assemble a powerful squad, upgrade your base, form bonds with townsfolk and maintain high morale among your team. Can you rise to the challenge and lead your heroes to victory?

name: Nadyr
description: Nadyr is a fixed camera, survival horror, party-based RPG.

name: Ticker Tape
description: Buy and sell commodities with friends to see who will be the fattest Wall Street Cat! Speculate low value stocks will rise to be re-sold for a profit! Cry as the stocks you paid too much for plummet for the second time in one turn!

name: The Janitor
description: Take a deep dive into an isometric dystopian world of corporate intrigue in this mechanical whack and smash. Join the janitor as he solves puzzles and thwarts traps to find his way out of the clutches of his captors. Utilize hidden potential to become a savior of the queen and a hero to the ants.

name: The Lab and Dungeons
description: The Lab and Dungeons is a fusion of roguelike action and shooter RPG. As a robot, mine ores, craft unique weapons, and conquer procedural dungeons. Collect materials to unlock more advanced weapons. From a novice to a high-spec warrior robot, enjoy physics-based combat solo or in co-op mode online!

name: The Exit 8
description: You are trapped in an endless underground passageway. Take a good look around and find a way to escape.

name: Carnaval Simulator
description: Carnaval Simulator is an indie game where you build, design and manage spectacular parade floats. Inspired by the magic of real-world celebrations like Mardi Gras, Carnival of Venice, and more. This parade tycoon lets you truly immerse yourself in Carnival.

name: Alien Cafe
description: Run a fast food restaurant for aliens powered by AI, and experience life in space!

name: Bullethell
description: Bullethell is an experimental, retro-hardcore, barely playable, ultra fast-paced, arena topdown shooter that can be finished in 20 seconds.

name: Youmenkiden
description: A side-scrolling action platformer in the style of NES/Famicom games. Play as high school student Zankirou Tougi as he is whisked away into a world where he must do battle against fearsome youkai.

name: Firva Strings of Fate
description: Join Firva in a dark and fantastical medieval realm as she embarks on a perilous quest to save her mother and sister. Explore a world filled with breathtaking landscapes and daunting challenges that will test your wits and bravery.

name: Crimson Tide
description: In Crimson Tide, become Antonio, an Italian fisherman, on an endless quest for the dream catch. Mysteriously cast into darkness on a shoreline of shipwrecked dreams, your sole escape is a distant lighthouse. With unwavering determination, conquer the darkness, and rediscover your true purpose.

name: The Quiet Execution
description: A dark, suspenseful, first-person horror game where you play as the executioner of a demonic cult. When you thought your work was over, the evil entity gave you an irrefusable offer. Possess an ancient evil, become the Quiet Reaper once more. Your freedom lies behind one last life to be sacrificed.

name: Boons & Burdens
description: Boons & Burdens is a single player action-roguelike set in the depths of hell. Battle hordes of demons through 13 levels, collect gems to purchase powerful boons, and choose from deadly burdens that alter the game's difficulty. Will you be the paragon of power or the architect of your own defeat?

name: Shell's Kitchen
description: Dive into a fintastic culinary adventure where fish serve fish dishes to fishes, and scale new heights of seafood fun with your friends in this cooperative cooking game!

name: BoneField: Bodycam Horror
description: Bonefield, Montana. You’re a PI hired to look into a whistleblower report, but the horrors lurking in this town are worse than expected. Experience bodycam horror, survive against relentless stalkers, find weapons to keep them back. Survive long enough to complete your investigation - and get out.

name: World Simulator 3
description: Ability to create and run wordplay worlds (support for workshops); Attribute values between different worlds can be correlated and inheritable (gathering is a large universe, scattering is full of stars), or they can be isolated from each other. Small World Simulator is a lot of fun!

name: Virtuous
description: Virtuous is an immersive, action-adventure RPG. Acquire all the virtues! Embark on quests, fight with your sword, bow and shield, or use them to solve puzzles. Explore wonderful worlds, ride boats, horse wagons, gondolas. Learn about different Saints and Angels from their icons or statues, and more.

name: Deepophobia
description: Swim deeper and deeper into this underwater horror game. Explore open worlds. Find your beloved companions. Hunt. Escape getting eaten alive. What are you waiting for? the depths are beckoning you to go deeper!

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Dogs
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Dogs - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Fragile Love
description: A Chinese-language visual novel.

name: Niwa: Japanese Garden Simulator
description: Niwa: Japanese Garden Simulator is a gardening simulator that gives you the freedom to design your own zen gardens. Set in Kyoto, Japan, you are tasked with learning authentic Japanese gardening techniques and applying them to realistic reproductions of historical locations in the city.

name: Patrons
description: Battle up to 3 friends in hilarious hammer-based combat for the entertainment of the Gods! Unlock a plethora of powers bestowed from your godly patrons as you duck hammers, hazards, and divine disruptions. In classic couch competitive fashion, Patrons is best played within elbowing distance.

name: Point Salad
description: Build a salad of veggies and collect point cards in order to score the most points in Point Salad, a digital adaptation of a tableau-building, strategy, turn based, game for the whole family!

name: Whispers in the Dark
description: Whispers in the Dark is an online cooperative RPG horror game mixing exploration phases of haunted and management places. Improve your character, his knowledge of the paranormal, his skills and his tools thanks to a research system.

name: Survival Circle
description: College students trapped in collapsed buildings. Stranger things going on inside the building.

name: The Smell of Death: A Tsugunohi Tale - Steam Edition
description: "Tsugunohi" creator ImCyan's former 3D dungeon horror film is now available on Steam. The game also features a battle mode against monsters, and if you complete the hard mode, which is new to the Steam version, a later story will appear. Can you escape safely from the "world of death"?

name: Car For Sale Simulator 2023: Super Sports DLC
description: This new DLC offers players an exciting experience because it includes a total of 10 super sports cars. Fans of the game will experience a gameplay filled with speed and adrenaline with this DLC. Each car comes with detailed models, powerful engines, and unique driving features.

name: An Arcade Full of Cats: TimeWarp Trouble
description: Leo and Fofiño may have bitten off more than they can chew this time! Embark on an exciting journey through three brand-new scenarios in the latest expansion for "An Arcade Full of Cats".

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Colorful 3
description: Colorful puzzles!

name: Midnight Monitor: Halloween Forever
description: Do you wish it could be Halloween every day? Now it can be!

name: Magic Doom
description: This is a full four-episode megawad and gameplay mod for The Ultimate Doom.What started as "I'll make a few vanilla maps" turned into 4 full episodes with some modified weapons and enemies. The focus for this project was to create lots of fast action, fun nonlinear layouts that don't take a huge amount of time to complete, and as little grind as possible, all within the restrictions of vanilla doom v1.9. To accommodate that goal, most weapons and monsters have been rebalanced in favor of speed and/or damage vs. tankiness.

name: Theme-Gawad
description: Each mapper has taken a specific theme, and then tried to make something nice looking, but also fun, within specific confines (3072*3072 Grid or Smaller, bar some exceptions, and stock textures-only). This Doom II megawad is divided between chapters of varying difficulty, with each chapter using specific monsters and enemies, with the purpose of the whole thing feeling like a gradually more challenging adventure.

name: Plutosis
description: 4 maps for Plutonia.

name: Emaki
description:
Marble popper mobile action-puzzle game designed for mobile devices. In this game, players embark on a challenging journey to assist a young artist in creating her magical masterpieces.

The objective of the game is to guide a carriage that can shoot and destroy incoming balls, which are imbued with magic paints. The player's task is to eliminate these balls before they reach a well and color the paintings they pass by.

This game offers a substantial amount of content, featuring a total of 25 levels within the adventure. Players can explore different game modes, collect jewels and power-ups, and strive to unlock various achievements. Success in "Marble Popper" requires precise aiming and strategic planning as players progress through increasingly challenging levels.

name: College Sex: Episode 4
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they go on a double date at a nightclub that is about to be opened.

name: Japanese Milf
description: Welcome to the Japanese Milf game, it is a game for adults created for virtual reality.

name: Quickie: Fantasy Adventure
description: Gather your companions and set off on an epic quest to save your beloved home. Encounter mysterious forces, seduce strange and sexy creatures... and shape the fate of the world in this exciting and sexy visual novel!

name: Tickle Girl
description: The player takes on the role of a naughty feather and tickles the girl in bed to make her laugh merrily.

name: Anime Angels feat. Tomozero
description: Solve tile-swapping puzzles to unveil pretty anime girls drawn by the artist Tomozero.

name: Married Life With a Lamia
description: Our Hero went hunting for treasure in the desert, eventually finding the location of an Ancient Pyramid. It was here that, fortunately - or perhaps unfortunately - through surviving the trials, he came to have the Pyramid Owner as his wife.

name: Sky Hunter
description: Who can become a monster-fighting warrior? I heard that young ladies like such warriors.

name: Puzzle Vacations: Japan
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Vacations: Christmas
description:
Wishing you a season full of light and laughter for you and your family.
With tons of challenging puzzles to choose from, stunning scenery to enjoy, you can coddiwomple towards Christmas at your own pace.

name: Hentai Party
description: Sin descripción

name: People Will Money
description: Sin descripción

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition includes:
• SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories
• Deluxe Outing Pack
- Thrilling Outfit Pack
- Excited Outfit Pack
- Anya's Bond Dress and Bond Hat
• Deluxe Edition Bonus: Anya's Director Chimera Hat

name: Real Car Parking 2024: Driving Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Fishing 3D
description: "Real Fishing 3D" is a mobile game, offering an immersive virtual fishing experience. It features HD graphics and a lifelike game world.

name: Pawfectly Designed
description: Design, Play, Imagine - Pawfectly Designed lets kids create enchanting worlds for their furry friends and design their dream spaces!

name: Dolmenjord: Viking Islands
description: Arrange the Viking villages in the islands to expand their domains, in this logic puzzle game! After years of battles, a group of Vikings decided to conquer new lands. Under the protection of the god Njord, a new clan sets out in search of glory!

name: The Adventures of Timmy: Run Kitty Run
description:
The Adventures of Timmy: Run Kitty Run is a side-scrolling platformer game, focused on a boy who must battle a bully to save his true love: Kitty.

Join Timmy in a quest to rescue the girl of his dreams in "The Adventures of Timmy." This game offers a story-driven world filled with fast-paced fun and has received recognition from the press. Timmy is not your average kid; he's the coolest you'll ever encounter, especially in his iconic cat suit. His mission is to rescue Kitty, the school's prettiest girl, who has been captured by the school bully, Mitch. Timmy embarks on an imaginative journey to infiltrate Mitch's tree house lair and save Kitty.

name: Zombie Farm 2
description:
Build and expand your farm of zombies: raise your undead, harvest them, and mutate them to form stronger breeds.

Invade your enemies’ farms by launching an invasion using a bloodthirsty zombie army.

Decorate your farms with the best bling, and see what your friends are up to and how their farms look like.

name: Slide
description: Retro iOS unlocking action. You do it all the time, but have you mastered it? A simple yet addictive game which tests your speed and unlocking prowess.

name: Meril Kururinchi
description: An Umihara Kawase-like freeware game released by Sasakoge in 2007. The game stars a girl named Meril who can use a clover-adorned vine to swing around stages and collect items. There are 30 stages of increasing difficulty.

name: Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion
description: Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion is a wuxia open-world RPG as well as a pixelated Jianghu survival simulator where you start as a nobody and struggle your way to rise in the world of martial arts.

name: Dead Plate
description: Short 2D restaurant tycoon themed rpg horror game with visual novel and point-and-click elements set in 1960s France following the story of a lively waiter named Rody trying to make as much money as possible in a week at a fancy bistro owned by a charismatic and successful chef, Vince.

name: Girlkiller
description:
There is a girl who looks like you. Today is the day you're going to kill her.

An illustrated erotic queer horror IF about being trans, among other things.

name: Sigil II
description: SIGIL II is the unofficial sixth episode for 1993’s DOOM. SIGIL II requires the registered version of DOOM to run.

name: Please Tell Me You Love Me
description:
It's been years since dragonsblood destiny online had enough active members to make it worth keeping the servers running, so it's finally shutting down. You and some of your old guild decide to reunite - including shewolf87, who you haven't spoken to in years, and whose real name you don't even know. But you know you loved her all those years ago, and you know there's still something left.

Can you tell someone you love them, at the end of the world?

name: "So, About Last Night..."
description: "So, About Last Night..." is an interactive web-based novella. Taking place in 1996 Southern California, Lacey tries finding the girl she hooked up with before she woke up with the worst hangover of her life and an impulse to drink blood.

name: Girlfriend Guide
description: Girlfriend Guide is a boys-love romantic comedy visual novel about finding true love, failing miserably to do so and making friends along the way.

name: Taxi Trouble
description: Pick up customers. Take them to their destination. Keep an eye on the timer. Try not to kill anyone.

name: Purdy-Durdy
description: A tiny hurdy-gurdy simulator for Playdate.

name: Invasion To Cane
description:
An engaging 2D platformer about liberating a captured asteroid.

Embark on an exciting journey in this narrative-driven 2D platformer, where you must liberate a captured asteroid. With a multitude of gameplay mechanics, players will navigate through challenging obstacles, defeat enemies, and uncover the unfolding story while solving the mystery behind it all. Prepare to leave no stone unturned as you fight for justice and restore harmony to the asteroid. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure!

name: Dust Breeding
description: Develop your true self-knowledge!

name: World of Warcraft: Dragonflight - Guardians of the Dream
description:
The Emerald Dream is a verdant and powerful place that serves as a source of life and hope and is essential to Azeroth's continued survival. It has been protected for centuries under the watchful eyes of the Green Dragonflight. In those centuries, they have fought off the Old Gods, the Burning Legion, and other threats. Now vulnerable to attack once again from Fyrakk and his forces, Azeroth's champions must pull together to save it from destruction at all costs.

A special seed, planted by Tyrande, has grown into a new World Tree and is on the verge of crossing into Azeroth. Fyrakk and his forces, including his new allies—the Druids of the Flame, move beneath the boughs of the World Tree, inflaming the Dream denizens as they attempt to infuse the heart of the World Tree with fire and use it as a conduit to spread eternal flames throughout Azeroth.

name: Ship of Fools: Water Garden Duo
description: New Fools have emerged from the ponds. The Water Garden duo is ready to join your crew.

name: Outbreak
description: They say it started in a lab, but no one knows for sure. It doesn't matter anyway, you just need to survive another 10 minutes!

name: Dahlia: Lasciatemi morire
description:
A short RPG questioning the meaning of human life in a world crumbling to death.

Dahlia, a girl with aphasia, whistles gloomily as she proceeds down a cold, dark path for a certain purpose.

name: (I see) Nothing
description: (I see) Nothing is a drama Visual Novel with little bit of horror and denpa in certain storylines. The game let's you choose MC's name as well as gender and the chosen gender does slightly affect the game's art.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper Aggressive
description: Hyper Aggressive is a strategic puzzle game aiming to provide some sensitivity for the binary numeral system. The playing area mainly consists of fields coloured in red or blue (the colours of the players) or grey (neutral areas). These fields are either numbered 0 or 1. The goal is to switch fields numbered 0 faster to 1 than your opponent does, using binary operands like EOR, ORA or AND. Since the game follows binary patterns, changing the value of one field will also affect the neighbouring values...

name: Colonel Kerfuffle in Castle Calamity
description: Help Colonel Kerfuffle navigate through the ruins of Castle Conundrum to find and recover a fortune in treasure left behind by the Eighth Count of Conundrum. This expedition will not be an easy one, since the castle is badly in need of repair. Beware, legend has it that the castle is haunted!!

name: Colonel Kerfuffle in Tiki Treasure
description:
Colonel Kerfuffle is in search of the legendary Tiki Treasure of Tiki Treasure Island!

Help him avoid The Terrible Tikis, Meddling Monkeys and other dangerous obstacles, to find the treasure before time runs out!

name: Sydney Shark
description: The sequel to the flash game Miami Shark, Sydney Shark has players embark on another adventure in the waters of Sydney. The gameplay remains unchanged, offering the same action-packed experience of destruction and mayhem of the original game. However, Sydney Shark introduces new ways to wreak havoc by taking down helicopters carrying koalas, obliterating crocodile blimps, and intercepting nuclear missiles.

name: Coldsteel Adventure 7
description:
Get ready to become the strongest fighter in the Sonic Fighting Academy in 64 BITS!
Coldsteel The Hedgeheg's 7th outing on the N64 is edgier than ever). Can you beat Trent Razner's ultimate challenge?

name: Sonic Adventure 7
description: Sonic Adventure 7 is an unlicensed 2D platformer based on Sonic Adventure for the Game Boy Color released by Makon Soft Studios in 1999.

name: Lian'ai Qitan: Bu Cunzai de Zhenxiang
description: In River City, there is an ordinary milk tea shop, but with one peculiar thing about it - almost every day there is a huge line in front of it. Is it just due to its popularity? Or is someone specifically hiring people to stand in that line? And if the second is true, then what is the reason for this - is someone playing some dirty game against the owner of the tea shop, or is there even greater conspiracy behind all this?

name: Rando'Knights
description: Incremental mobile game centered around collecting 2D knight figurines.

name: Blue Ninja: Superhero Game
description: Ultra superhero parody game.

name: Thief: The Complete Collection
description: Slip into the world of Garrett, the greatest thief the world has never seen. Thief - The Complete Collection contains all three of the genre-defining stealth adventures, including the ultra-rare Gold edition of the first Thief game.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2: Deluxe Edition
description:
Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 lets you duke it out with the biggest and best fighting character roster yet! This Deluxe edition contains the following content:
• Full Base Game
• Season Pass Content
- 4 additional brawlers
- Bonus SpongeBob Squarepants "The Quickster" Costume

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2: Ultimate Edition
description:
Duke it out with the biggest and best fighting character roster yet! This Ultimate edition contains the following content:
• Full Base Game
• Season Pass Content
- 4 additional brawlers
- Bonus SpongeBob Squarepants "The Quickster" Costume
• A bonus costume for every brawler!

name: UpWorld
