description: Embark on a breathtaking journey unlike any other in UpWorld. a parkour adventure that will challenge your skills, your heart, and your sense of wonder. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and become the hero you were born to be?

name: Harlequin Fair: Harbour Dawn
description: Return to Toronto's sullen streets — now raked by northern winter winds — in this free expansion campaign. Come back to the realm of the masquerade dreamer: come back to the Harlequin fair.

name: The Slimy Lichmummy
description: The Slimy Lichmummy is an adventure game by Ulf Åström, similar in style to the classic "Rogue".

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gyakuten 2
description: A sequel to the fan made Japanese doujin game based on Haruhi Suzumiya and the Ace Attorney. The sequel comes packaged with the first entery in the franchise.

name: Pokémon Darkness
description: Super Mario World hack rom where the player controls the Pokémon, Mew, in a world inspired by the pocket monsters franchise.

name: Spectra
description: A grimy, neon filled immersive sim set in a dystopian alternate history 1972. Sneak, fight, and trick your way through a beautifully ugly city, and discover the world of Spectra.

name: Laby and the Mysterious Planet
description: Laby and the Mysterious Planet can be played anytime and with anyone! A quiz game where up to 8 players can play together to win. On a mysterious planet where "piece of quiz" are floating, you and your robot buddy "Laby" will try to restore the liveliness of the planet through quizzes!

name: Who Let the Frog Out
description: Who Let the Frog Out is an exciting arcade game where you take control of a brave frog and embark on an adventure filled with dangers and incredible opportunities.

name: Rift Saviours
description: Rift Saviours is a bullet heaven type of game, that enhaces the genre with survival elements. In this game YOU become the bullet hell by crafting your own build in order to survive the never ending hordes of enemies that appear through the different rifts in the world. Will you become the Saviour?

name: Summer Beach
description: This is an adult sandbox love simulation game. You will meet and fall in love with many beauties with different personalities, and embark on sweet journeys one after another. Of course, there are no restrictions. In this seaside town, there is everything worth remembering.

name: Soul Street
description: Psychic Sleuth: Street of Falling Souls is a deductive adventure game that combines narrative and puzzle solving, with rational reasoning to obtain relevant and important information to advance the story and unravel the truth of the case, as well as the mysterious forces behind the organisation.

name: Pillow Champ
description: Challenge the world one pillow at a time in this irreverent 2.5D fighting game. Featuring a range of singleplayer options, local multiplayer, and online multiplayer with rollback netcode!

name: Kagidoko: A Deep Learning Horror Game
description: Kagidoko is an experimental horror game where every jumpscare has a reason. Collect all keys, open all doors, and get out of that house... While being stalked by a Deep Learning Gameplay AI.

name: SkyFly
description: A casual, high flying racing game

name: Burglar's Bazaar
description: "Grow your business by stealing. Sell the stolen goods in your own shop. Don't get caught by landlords. Hide, steal, and sell! Provide good service to your customers!"

name: Banzai Escape 2: Subterranean - Tesla Technology
description: Tesla Technology provide player with new energy base weapon and Nanoplugin

name: Light Up The Sky
description: Get ready to embark on an illuminating adventure like no other in 'Light Up the Sky'! In this game, you take on the role of a charming firefly, the guardian of a mystical forest. Your mission is to light up the night sky and save your fellow fireflies from the clutches of darkness.

name: Brain Overload: Calculate
description: A computing training game where you get shot when you open the game. Train yourself, challenge the game producer, and exercise your brain!

name: Enishia and the Binding Brand
description: Having sworn to protect the town's church, the gentle nun, Enishia, buys the deed to the land from a greedy merchant company. Now she must do odd jobs around the town to pay off the debt.

name: Knight Case Files
description: Tradition becomes fact, and historical fact becomes a lie... The setting is a 19th century-style otherworld, the Kingdom of the Phoenix. It was a fairy tale that the dead would come back to life. Except for those who know the truth.

name: Sun Spear
description: When ancient darkness threatens to swallow the world whole, call upon the power of the light! Wield the Sun Spear against the creatures of the night as Bonnie, a steadfast warrior determined to save her village. Can you seal away horrors untold before night falls forever?

name: Bring Me that Shawarma
description: A visual novel about shawarma, consisting of multiple episodes.

name: Cats and Seek: Osaka
description: Hey, do you have 5 minutes to spare? Let's play hide and seek with 100 cats in Osaka! Can you find them all?

name: Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life - Mukumuku Outfit
description: Mukumuku Outfit is for use with STORY OF SEASONS: A Wonderful Life.

name: Fairy Comedy: A Love Hard To Find
description: Sin descripción

name: Quiz Parampaa
description: Indonesian quiz puzzle game inspired by The Impossible Game.

name: Risk of Rain 2: EXXXXXXX-X
description: An ancient threat awakens on Petrichor V. Master new Survivors, wield new items, and fight your way across uncharted regions. Ascend the levels of the Colossus in a race to confront The False Son. Defeat him and unlock the true power of his Soul!

name: Arena Tails
description: Arena Tails is a Roguelite 3rd Person Shooter. Players can control heroes with unique abilities and weapons which can level up to unlock rewards that change everytime you play the game. You can play the game alone, or join 4-player Co-Op.

name: Seren Nova
description: Seren Nova is a top-down 3D retro sci-fi game set in a solar system at war. Choose the best ship to complete each mission and take out the enemy across various planets. You can even land your ship and take the war to the enemy on foot. Featuring a fun retro sci-fi live-action cutscenes and puppets!

name: Hentai Tales: Sex Apartment
description: There is a place called "Sex Apartment", which has an open sexual mind and is full of carnival every night. Here residents can visit any house at any time, invite or join them in the carnival. You are a new one who has just moved into "Sex Apartment". What will happen there?

name: Parcel Mania
description: A multiplayer party game that supports up to 4 players! Compete with your friends to reach the highest score in this one and only Delivery Royale, PARCEL MANIA!

name: Infinity Sky
description: In "Infinity Sky," navigate a thrilling aerial journey, dodging skyscrapers and collecting rings of fire. Conquer endless challenges, compete globally, and experience immersive gaming with Perspectacles. Are you ready for high-flying excitement?

name: InfestStation
description:
In this dystopian future world, players take on the role of OMICRONIX Corp Recovery technicians sent out to derelict space stations to resolve the interdimensional catastrophes caused by the Faster-Than-Light Crimson Engine drives.

Threatened by otherworldly malevolent forces, players must work together to survive the horrors stalking them as they seek to sever this interdimensional rift and disable the Crimson Drive Cores once and for all.

InfestStation is a multiplayer Sci-Fi horror game. Board danger-filled abandoned space craft, work together to complete objectives, and sever the dimensional gateways that have allowed horrifying threats to take over and infest these now derelict spaces.

name: GuardGrave
description: GuardGrave is an old school styled game in the vein of BurgerTime. Players must close the coffins on each stage before the sun comes up. 7 Worlds, 7 Bosses and 37 Stages of co-op monster bashing mayhem!

name: Lucid Echoes
description: Enter a World of Your Dreams!This immersive first-person action-adventure transforms your dream journal entries into a narrative-rich playground. Create, Explore, and Unravel. Expect the unexpected in this ever-evolving dream world - beware though - you are not alone!

name: Special Forces War: Zombie Attack
description: "Special Forces War - Zombie Attack" is a very fun and interesting casual strategy tower defense game. In the game, you can control your own soldiers to start a battle with zombies. The game content is rich and exciting, full of fun, and can bring a relaxing and enjoyable game experience.

name: Falling for Beans
description: Falling for Beans is a platformer where you must strategically descend a mystical Beanstalk, while you manage your health and outrun a Giant constantly on your tail. Do you think you can survive?

name: Chamberflame
description: Action-roguelite shooter. Each run is different from the last, with unique weapons, upgrade artifacts, enemies, and procedurally generated areas.

name: Custom Order Maild 3D2: It's a Night Magic Love Hotel Karaoke All in Pack
description: Included in this DLC: 【New Yotogi Events】 Love Hotel Tour *Compatible with Muku, Majime, and Rindere heroine types. 【Costume】 Winter Sweater & Dress Set 【Hairstyles】 Empress Hair Set Cool Beauty Hair Set + Accessories Set 【Background】 Love Hotel 2 【Dance】 Reformative Heartography Karaoke Dance

name: DMZ
description: DMZ is a VR content that allows you to explore the area around the DMZ in Yeoncheon. Accompanied by a soldier, you can learn about the history and natural ecosystems of the DMZ area. You can also experience landmine removal through minigames.

name: Run x Gun
description: Run and gun while you shoot down hoards of alien space ships in a bullet hell shooter/endless runner. Upgrade you gun with various power ups and weapon types like rockets, grenades and lasers. And finally defeat menacing boss ships to save the world from the scourge of alien invaders.

name: Camping Vlog Simulator 2024
description: Witness breathtaking sunsets and pitch your tent under starry skies. Record your camping adventures and share them with the world!

name: Redemption of the Cat Demon Girl
description: You meet the cat demon girl "Suzu" when you go to a merchant's "friend" and he forcibly gives you Suzu, whose origin is unknown, but as certain things progress, you'll gradually find that some people and things are in need of redemption, and the "redemption" of ...... is, in the end, who?

name: Firepower Forge
description: Firepower Forge is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS with custom classes, interactive maps, and lots of chaos.

name: Progress Chess
description: Progress Chess is the most complete simulator of chess and chess competitions to date, taking place in realistic 3D spaces: from a home apartment to a chess club! By playing in tournaments and solving problems, go from beginner to FIDE master!

name: Sabbath
description: Paul is a humble employee of Sabbath incorporated. a strange company where not only humans work, but also mummies, robots and who knows what else. Paul's greatest dream is to become the president of Sabbath Inc., but to do so he will have to defeat the current president.

name: MoonBright
description: A New Adventure Based on Ancient Times! MoonBright is an RPG video game set in the Mexico of the 2000s! Immerse yourself in a new world, full of mysteries, characters to meet, and an adventure to discover!

name: Always in Mind
description: A story-rich adventure set in the mind of a young boy named Teddy. Embark on a surreal journey across breathtaking mindscapes as you unlock unbelievable powers and forge an unlikely bond with an AI companion named "Proxy."

name: Infinite Runner
description: Dive into the ultimate test of reflexes and agility in Infinite Runner. With simple controls and an addictive gameplay loop, you'll find yourself immersed in an infinite adventure where every hop counts.

name: 20MTD: Emberpath
description: 20MTD: Emberpath is a spin-off of the acclaimed 20 Minutes Till Dawn. In this roguelike, you combine different abilities and artifacts to create an almighty character that can mow down waves of Lovecraftian creatures. Can you hold out against the horde, until the night is over?

name: Endless Furry Tower Defense
description: Slaughter furries before they destroy your base! Get upgrades and climb leaderboards to be the best!

name: Little Bombers Returns
description: Bomberman-alike game.

name: Punch Jump
description: Punch Jump is a diffcult/rage platformer. Your job is relatively simple: bring Carl to the top of the level. This will not be easy and the player will fail numerous times. This game is inspired by games like Jump King. It is a Foddian rage platformer.

name: Lost in Nowhere
description: Experience a blend of Action, Adventure, and Horror in "Lost in Nowhere." Solve puzzles in a gloomy labyrinth while creatures hunt you down. Find weapons and survive!

name: SleepWalk
description: Sleepwalk is an indie survival horror game, the story begins with the player waking up in an unknown and dark place, trying to escape and discover hidden secrets with no memory of their arrival.

name: Whimel Academy
description: Whimel is a cozy academia time-management dating simulation game set in a magic school. Study magic, develop hobbies and fall in love in this wholesome and enchanting place.

name: Let's Play! Oink Games: Rafter Five
description: You were supporting it all? Will it collapse!? Will it hold!? Enjoy the strange balancing act in this brainy, balance game!

name: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room
description: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room is a community run experimental story game. With the end of the world fast approaching, Dr. Gumphrey Finklestein announces his plans for a groundbreaking scientific experiment. What will it entail? Does even he know?

name: Full Bloom
description: Full Bloom is a cute adventure game with puzzle and minigame elements! Can you help Bloom leave her room?

name: FUR Squadron Phoenix
description: Embark on an action-packed adventure in this on-rails space shooter. As a trainee pilot, you will fight in strange virtual worlds. Master your ship, upgrade your skills and protect the federation from an imminent threat. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Goblin and Coins II: The Lost Recipes
description: A much easier stand-alone expansion to Goblin and Coins II. Use unlimited continues to run and double-jump through 25 handcrafted levels, and retrieve the recipes lost in the midnight raid from the original game.

name: Super Mario: The Cursed Forest
description: Super Mario: The Cursed Forest is a Brazilian rom hack that places Mario in a scary forest that he needs to find a way out of.

name: Super Wakana Land
description: Help Wakana finding her missing donations box in an entertaining quest! She will encounter lots of characters along the way, which will either help or obstacle her. Will she find her donations box?

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Pocket Horror
description:
Five Nights at Freddy's - Pocket Horror is a FNaFangame, reimagining the first game of the franchise as a 90's Game Boy/Game Boy Color release.
Or you can just call it a "demake".

name: Doom Core
description: This is a collection of 32 levels previously unreleased (with the exception of REJECTS.WAD) This is a collection of levels Michael Jan Krizik (valkiriforce) made from November 2009 - December 2010.

name: Hell Revealations
description: Hell Revealations is a full-length megawad (33 maps + 11 bonus) created by The Slotter Team led by @Arsinikk. It is the unofficial sequel and successor to Hell Revealed and Hell Revealed II. For additional information about the megawad, check out the HRs Infopack included in the download!

name: Newgothic Movement 2
description: Newgothic Movement 2 (also known as New Gothic Movement II) is a seventeen-map Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports by Christopher Shepherd (ArmouredBlood) and Arthur O. (Archi). It is a sequel to 2010's Newgothic Movement 1 and features a similar slaughter map style of gameplay.

name: Project: Unity
description: Project: Unity is a full 32 map megawad for Doom II Designed to be fully optimized for the Unity port! This map set comes from some members of the Console Doom Speedrunning community. Don't worry, that does not mean this was designed for speedrunners.

name: Surge
description: Surge is a 17-level Boom-compatible megawad designed by Josh Sealy (Joshy) and released in February 2012. The mapset was inspired by Scythe and Speed of Doom, emphasizing flow and gameplay over visuals. The project was originally meant to be a complete 32-level megawad, but was abandoned by Sealy due to education commitments. Only 17 maps were completed, plus 1 unfinished map.

name: Vispire
description: A collection of fast, fun old-school maps with varying difficulty levels.

name: Plants vs. Zombies
description: A J2ME port of Plants vs. Zombies which includes less features to make the game size small enough for Java-based phones.

name: Apex Rebels
description: Players can control their racing destiny by choosing from five high-octane vehicles. At the start of each lap, they must pass through one of three checkpoints that will determine the driving route best suited for their racing style. Passing through progressive checkpoints gives speed boosts and unlocks advanced skills like Slipstream, Power Drifts, and Aero-Drifts. Aero-Drift is a ground-breaking technique that raises the car, allowing players to race through corners at blazing speeds, effortlessly overtaking their rivals. Every aspect of gameplay is designed to be thrilling and encourages a competitive spirit that sees players take down their rivals and jump into slipstreams to earn an extra boost, giving them an edge to seize victory!

name: Dora the Explorer: Twins' Day
description: It's Twins Day; Dora, Boots and Dora's puppy Perrito set out on an exciting journey to Play Park for the Twins Day celebration and look for Perrito's twin brother.

name: Everwarder
description: Everwarder is a 2D tower defense with elements of roguelite. Defend the crystal against endless streams of enemies while exploring the world. Design your defense and keep up with constantly rising difficulty by acquiring powerful artifacts, evolve units, progress in upgrade tree and more!

name: Cheesecake Cult: Unholy Feast
description: "In this spine-chilling adventure, you will delve into the eerie world of a cult that worships a sinister deity through the creation and consumption of blasphemous cheesecakes. As the protagonist, you must navigate through a nightmarish maze of secrets, rituals, and unspeakable horrors to unravel the truth and escape with your sanity intact. Did I mention you are being followed by the cult leader?"

name: Journey To Bethlehem: Fig Run
description: Journey To Bethlehem: Fig Run is a promotional browser game based on the 2023 movie Journey To Bethlehem.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Essendon Super Quiz
description: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Essendon Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Essendon.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Adelaide Super Quiz
description: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Adelaide Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Adelaide.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Carlton Super Quiz
description: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Carlton Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Carlton.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Collingwood Super Quiz
description: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Collingwood Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Collingwood.

description: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Geelong Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Geelong.

description: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - West Coast Eagles Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team West Coast.

description: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Richmond Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Richmond.

name: Disney 100
description: Disney 100 is a mobile-browser game by McDonald's. The game was made as a promotional tie in for the November 2023 Disney McDonald's Happy Meal campaign, which was made to celebrate the 100th anniversary of Disney.

name: The Invincible: Deluxe Edition
description: Packed with additional content, The Invincible: Deluxe Edition lets you take an even deeper dive into a hard sci-fi adventure. Enjoy the base game along with The Art of The Invincible digital artbook, a digital comic book, and the game's Original Soundtrack.

name: Witches & Woodlands
description: On the first twilight... we shall play an RPG. In this Umineko fanfic, we'll be able to see all the cousins playing a role playing game, with Beatrice as the game master. What kind of a cruel and challenging story will she weave? Will the adventurers manage to pass the seven trials? And finally - will they be able to defeat the final boss and save the day?

name: Minigolf Galaxy
description: Minigolf Galaxy invites you to create your very own cosmic minigolf courses, engage in fun challenges, and embark on a stellar journey through the universe.

name: Konna
description: A game made for the 41st Godot Wild Jam.

name: Campfire
description: Campfire is a cozy game featuring AI powered NPCs that players can interact with and have a completely non-linear experience.

name: Repeat the Ending
description: Explore an all-new "critical edition" of a 1996 Inform 5 game about mental illness, magic, and the second law of thermodynamics.

name: Polar Panic
description: Stay alive in the arctic while climate change destroys your habitat! Eat fish to keep your hunger down or you will starve! Stay away from trash and don't fall into the water.

name: Guncho
description:
Bandits are taking over the town and you're the only gunslinger around that can stop them. Battle through 5 bandit camps in this turn based rogue-like western to win the lucrative bounty or die trying.

This game is a PICO-8 version of Guncho, a 7DRL gamejam game. The original is made by Arnold Rauers and Terri Vellman.

name: Omakase! Savers
description:
Omakase! Savers is a comedy adventure game featuring live-action scenes. The player takes the role of the girls' classmate, who appears as a small ghost, and must guide the girls in their quest to seal the spirits again and restore their classmate to his human form. This primarily takes the form of exploring the town on foot, talking to the townsfolk and investigating to find the whereabouts of the spirits causing trouble. Occasional combat takes a semi-real-time format, with the player moving around freely but pausing to perform attacks.

The game is divided into four chapters, each focusing on a specific spirit that must be defeated and captured. The characters in the game are represented both by anime-style sprites and digitized photo portraits of real actors, while numerous live-action cutscenes drive the story.

name: Snake Break
description: Sin descripción

name: Pool Pro 2022
description: Sin descripción

name: Hungry Humphrey: Eat The World
description: Humphrey's epic munching quest awaits! With 45 levels, crafty AI, a rich soundtrack of 59 songs, 9 mini-games, and powerful power-ups and upgrades, get ready to feast your way to victory.

name: Early-blooming Black Lily: Moshi Mo-series
description: Sin descripción

name: Warlocks Deeds: Uncharted Realms
description: Gain access to various advanced features on Warlocks Deeds, Open up more of the what the world has to offer.

name: Hi-Fi Rush: Teamplay Costume Pack
description: Give your Hi-Fi Rush crew a new look inspired by each other's styles with the Teamplay Costume Pack! After all, sharing is caring.

name: Forza Horizon 5: American Automotive Car Pack
description: All-American all-stars are bringing the muscle to the Horizon Festival. Make the Festival rumble with the 2020 Chevrolet Silverado LT Trail Boss, 2023 Czinger 21C, 2017 Saleen S7 LM, and the 1961 DeBerti Ford Econoline 'Shop Rod'.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2: Costume Pack
description: Style up your brawl with this additional pack of ultimate costumes! Featuring a bonus costume for every brawler in the game.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2: Season Pass
description:
4 Additional brawlers join Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2! Grab all 4 of these additional brawlers at a great value and receive a bonus SpongeBob Squarepants “The Quickster” costume to best your foes in style.

In addition to SpongeBob Squarepants “The Quickster” costume, the Season Pass includes upcoming characters of:
- Mr. Krabs
- Zuko
- Rocksteady
- Uncle Iroh

name: Stranded: Alien Dawn Premium Edition
description: Purchase the Stranded: Alien Dawn Premium Edition to receive the critically acclaimed base game alongside its expansive new DLC, Robots and Guardians. Test your survival skills, overcome challenges and embrace unexpected events that you encounter on this deadly alien planet. Forge your story in this compelling planet survival sim.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Mini Quest
description:
This hack is based on The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker, with references from other games of the franchise.
Now go save Zelda once again!

name: Cartuchito World: Canella Edition
description:
Cartuchito World is a Super Mario World rom hack based on a web show called Cartuchito.

The Canella Edition is a later edition of the rom hack that replaces the character Ronaldo with Canella (putting Ronaldo in place of the character, Guitarrinha) and follows the cast replacement that took place on the YouTube channel.

name: The Wrath of Sona
description: A freeware classic style RPG made in QuickBasic. The game's plot involves the main character becoming a Mage Knight, though their master is killed as they were about to learn the most powerful spell. Character portraits are photos downloaded from the internet.

name: Deus Ex: Malkavian Mod
description: When you base your expectations only on what you see... you blind yourself, to the possibilities of a new mod release: The insanity returns. Old men... are the future.

name: Deus Ex: Greasel of the Year Edition
description: Ever wondered how Deus Ex would play out if the main character was a regular greasel instead of a nano-augmented agent? Now you won't have to.

name: Wan Nyan Pet Shop
description: Become an employee at a pet shop, interacting with dogs and cats while selling pet products. The player will take good care of the pets so that they meet their wonderful owner.

name: Wan Nyan Doubutsu Byouin
description: A Strategy game, published by TDK Core, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Silent Hill: The Gallows
description: Fan version of Silent Hill games . Immerse yourself in the world of Silent hill, fight monsters , to survive ..

name: Wan Nyan Doubutsu Byouin
description: Wan Nyan Doubutsu Byouin is a Simulation game, developed and published by Columbia Music Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Global Candy Cup 2015
description: Welcome to the Global Candy Cup, a fierce competition where four extraordinary witches race to collect the most candy before the end of Halloween. Join one witch’s worldwide team and keep playing throughout the day to add to your team’s score. Only one team will go home with the Cup — will it be yours?

name: Mario in Japan
description: A rom hack with just 1 level made for SMW Central's Chocolate Level Design 2010 contest.

name: Silent Hill Metamorphoses
description: The main character of the game, Eve Coulman, goes to Silent Hill looking for her missing brother. Arriving at the place, the girl is surprised at the snowfall in early May, and having met several bizarre characters on her way, she realizes that something strange is happening to the town.

name: Spiritual Soul
description: A tactical strategy game, developed and published by Shuwa System, which was released in Japan in 1998 for PC.

name: Spiritual Soul 2
description: A tactical strategy game, developed and published by Shuwa System, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Remote Presence
description: A strategy game, developed and published by Shuwa System, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Watashi no MakeSalon
description: A Game Boy Advance game where you work in a beauty salon.

name: Sinister Seven
description: 7 sp/coop maps, vanilla compatible

name: Real World
description: This wad was made in Germany, Delmenhorst. It's an update to my first wad "8Pack".

name: Real World 2
description: A 10 level wad for doom2. This wad was made in Delmenhorst, Germany.

name: Traitor
description: The Traitor game involves up to 12 players uncovering dark forces in a village, taking on various roles, and testing their intelligence and communication. It transitions between day and night, with unique abilities for each player. The winning team is determined based on tactics and deduction.

name: Fate/Hollow Ataraxia
description:
Fate/Hollow Ataraxia is a 2005 PC visual novel video game developed by TYPE-MOON and the sequel to Fate/Stay Night. The word "ataraxia" in the title is a Greek term for "tranquility", giving the title the combined meaning of "empty (or false) tranquility".

The game also was ported to PlayStation Vita, adding full-voice acting, among other enhancements. This version was released in Japan on November 27, 2014.

name: The Snowman
description: Sin descripción

name: Shigatsu Youka
description:
April of 2020. In the season, when cherry blossom petals dance in the wind...

In one city, a crimson red dead body was discovered. It was in such a horrific state that it was obvious at first glance. The subject has become very hot on television, the Internet, and social media. The cause is that there have been numerous similar accidents in the past.

It should have been something that appeared only in the media... And yet "something" has started to stir just behind certain women.

name: Unraveling Angel
description:
Unraveling Angel is a choice-based adult visual novel following a bisexual male protagonist in a city that struggles to live and breathe. As the player you make choices that lead him into the arms of one the three love interests; Veronika, Matt and Vice.
Pick the path he follows but know that there's only one universal truth. Behind every door lies a world of hurt, including the correct one.

name: Mindcircus
description:
Infu is a failed medical student on the verge of becoming an alcoholic.
Due to his naturally gloomy personality, he has been living a depressing life and before the summer vacation, he finally faces the risk of repeating a grade.
Meanwhile, he wins a ticket to travel to a tropical country in a lottery held by a credit card company. Infu throws everything away and goes on a trip in high spirits, but along the way he becomes involved in a mysterious series of murders.
Will Infu be able to uncover the truth behind the incident? And will he be able to escape from the island!? Hurry up before you start experiencing withdrawal symptoms!

name: Hotel Room Haunting
description: Inspired by the movie 1408 you must survive the night in the hotel room by not losing your own sanity. Immerse yourself in your overnight getaway, close the curtains, watch some TV, get some sleep if you can. Subject yourself to random events within the room as it tries to make you do things to lose the game.

name: Skibidi Shooter: Survival FPS
description: Confront Skibidi Toilet and other alphabet monsters or become Skibidi Toilet, the choice is your. Beware of the horror behind the doors in this arena.

name: FNaF 4 Retro Edition
description: This is a complete recreation of FNaF 4 in an 8-bit art style!

name: Sudoku: Tied Up & Bound
description: Sudoku: Tied Up & Bound is an adult PC version of Sudoku. The game plays like a regular game of Sudoku, however as you go on the board reveals more adult bondage imagery as it goes on.

name: Sudoku: Powered by Jamdat
description: Sudoku is a puzzle game. The aim of the puzzle is to enter a number from 1 trough 9 in each cell of a 9x9 grid made of 3x3 sub grids, starting with some digits given in some cells; each row, column and region must contain only one instance of each numeral.

name: Sudoku Online
description: Sudoku Online is an online playable version of the classic Sudoku puzzle game. The game features various difficulties such as easy, medium, hard, evil and impossible, as well as a mode for kids. The game also includes daily challenge boards to complete.

name: Cosplay House
description: In Cosplay House, you inherit a rundown hotel in the bustling city of Lumina. With no previous experience in hospitality and limited funds, you face a daunting challenge. But instead of running a traditional hotel, you decide to turn it into a cosplay house, a unique and trendy establishment catering to the needs of cosplayer cam girls.

name: Somme Trench
description: Somme Trench is an interactive historical-military novel by Andrew J. Schaefer, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects. You play as a fresh British infantryman at the Battle of the Somme, one of the longest and bloodiest battles of World War One.

name: Penduline Village
description: Penduline Village allows you to impersonate a witch moving in on her own island. She can then use her ability to cook and brew potions in order to help the villagers with the quests they offer, and get appreciated in the village.

name: Centauri Dark
description: Centauri Dark is a bullet-hell FPS where you fight against wave after wave of mechs in a bid for your own survival.

name: Emerald Woods
description:
A combat-less farming sandbox roguelike. Escape modern life to live alone in a mysterious land of forests, lakes, and caverns, inhabited only by strange animals.

In this place, miles away from any other human being, players are free to farm, hunt, build, craft, and scavenge while trying to survive. The game provides new experiences of wonder every time with a fresh new piece of land to explore.

Abandoned buildings where uncanny experiments took place decades ago are scattered all around, and the player can discover what happened there by examining documents and other surviving evidence. A company called Genco used to have its headquarters in the area, what happened to them? there will be a new answer to the question every time a new game is started.

name: Spacerat Miner
description: SpaceRat Miner project is a fast paced roguelike mining game with exciting gameplay. Try to collect gems digging as deep as possible into the planet. Dodge falling rocks, run away from lava and beat final bosses to become the best miner rat!

name: Block Buster
description: is a fast-paced block-placing puzzle game that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking. Get ready to dive into a frantic grid-based challenge where every second counts!

name: Forgotten Runiverse
description:
Forgotten Runiverse is a grand fantasy MMORPG full of magic and wonder based on the lore of Magic Machine's Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult NFT Collection. The game is developed and published by Bisonic, Inc.

The Runiverse is open to anyone – begin your adventure, play, create, own land, and earn your place in the pantheon of legends while owning the things you create.

Forgotten Runiverse allows players to adventure across a massive world to discover hidden secrets and quests and hunt a wide array of monsters and creatures for rare treasures and experience on your way to level 50. The rewards from these quests will allow players to craft and forge spells, weapons, armor, houses, decorations and more, each with unique qualities determined by both materials and your mastery of crafting.

Forgotten Runiverse includes on-chain content but does not require a wallet or engaging with the blockchain to play. Early releases of the game will allow users to mint certain cosmetic items to the Arbitrum blockchain to display, trade, or resell. The full release will also include in-game land plots that allow players to help shape the world for everyone by building traveling stations, material gathering stations, housing, or service buildings including forges and mage workshops.

name: Sound Mind
description: In Sound Mind, you and a friend (or a bitter enemy) play as Kaine or Mabel. The goal is simple: Keep all of the inheritance to yourself.

name: Under the Castle
description: Under the Castle is a classic rogue game where you'll explore infinite dungeons vanquishing enemies, gathering Orbs of Light and rescuing enslaved villagers. Use your weapons, potions, magic scrolls and even you own hat to navigate the treacherous depths and find your way to the Evil Lord!

name: Sky Fighters
description: A top-down, fast-paced shooter where you pilot a plane and use it to dogfight against those that seek to bring you down. Easy to understand but hard to master, the balance of risk-reward for score maximization while trying to not get overwhelmed is what this game is about! Try to reach to the highest score!

name: Defender X
description: A short, caravan shmup. Reach for higher scores, unlock new pallets, unveil the eye!

name: Steel Surge: Revolution
description: Steel Surge: Revolution is a short caravan shmup.

name: Polybius
description: Fan-made playable version of the rumored game called Polybius

name: Mr. Mix
description:
An early 90's typing game

A fan-made playable version of Mr. Mix

name: Classic Internet Scary Maze Game: Game Boy Edition
description: An unofficial Game Boy demake of The Maze.

name: FolcDark
description: FolcDark is a prologue of a third-person dark fantasy action-adventure game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.

name: Age of Ants
description:
Send your worker ants to gather resources… amass an army of bugs to defend your queen... build your ant empire and conquer the lawn!

A PICO-8 demake of Age of Empires II.

name: NotHog
description:
Stab your friends! Evade, fish for counterhits, and chip away at your opponent in head to head combat.

Inspired by Nidhogg and footsies.

name: Flicky
description: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive port of Flicky.

name: Kelsi Davies: Haunt Escape
description: A first person horror game about ghost hunting. Find spirits that need help, and communicate with them to help them move on. Has exploration, problem solving, as well as moments of stealth and action. Voiced by, and starring Kelsi Davies, a popular social media influencer.

name: UnDune II: The Demaking of a Dynasty
description:
A strategy-based resource management simulation, where three houses fight for control of the planet Dune - the land of sand and home of the spice.

It is a demake of the classic (and original) RTS game Dune II, re-created from scratch in PICO-8.

name: Bem Feito
description: "Bem Feito" is a Life Sim where players follow Reginaldo, a charming and almost silent protagonist. Reginaldo's simple life revolves around his daily household tasks, captivating friends, and perhaps, unexpected choices that subtly shape the course of the game.

name: Donsol
description:
A dungeon-crawler game built around a deck of 54 cards.

This is a demake of Donsol by John Eternal and Hundred Rabbits in PICO-8.

name: Drag Racing Car Simulator
description: Are you ready to prove your skills and become the ultimate racing champion?

name: ForRace GT2D
description: Experience a realistic race that you have not experienced in 2D. In Forrace, you can race with hundreds of cars on dozens of tracks. You can earn money and trade cars.

name: The Great Battle of Shark Monkey Squirrel Dinossaur Bird Bee
description: This is a story that has never been told before.

name: Radio Cars
description: Radio Controlled Car Challenge!

name: Mimic
description: A multiplayer survival horror game where players must choose their allies carefully to survive imminent danger. In this social-deduction game players won't know who to trust with their lives.

name: Chess For Playdate
description: Play Chess

name: GoldenShot
description: A billiards puzzle game for playdate console

name: Go Noodle
description: Like Snake but 200% more noodly. Fast crank action.

name: #Drive Rally
description: Drive Rally lets you relive the 90s in the most exciting era in motorsport history, where dust, mud, and snow are badges of honor. Unleash the raw power of legendary rally beasts, admire every second of the stunning landscapes, and remember: the faster you go, the better!

name: The Celestial Tales
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombotron Re-Boot
description:
Zombotron Re-Boot is a remaster of the original Zombotron Flash game series, with updated graphics, an improved physics engine and new, incredibly rich effects!

In this action platformer you will have to fight countless different enemies: zombies, robots and other mysterious monsters. Find weapons and upgrade your skills to find and rescue survivors, and explore this mysterious planet together.

name: Tales of Arise: Classic Characters Costume & Arranged BGM Pack
description: The Classic Characters Costume & Arranged BGM Pack includes special hairstyles, costumes, and weapons modeled after characters from the "Tales of" series, as well as new battle BGM tracks specially arranged by Motoi Sakuraba.

name: The Neverwhere Tales : Book 1
description: The Neverwhere Tales - Book 1 is a story-driven Adult Visual Novel. The story takes place in an urban fantasy setting and combines a modern world with fantasy elements. Book 1 is the story of Alexander Callister and how he learns about this hidden world called "Neverwhere."

name: Watermelon Challenge
description: Face off in 'Watermelon Challenge,' the engaging puzzle game where players merge fruits to the rhythm of victory. Duel head-to-head, ascend the leaderboards, navigate a world filled with vibrant strategy, all while your dependable duck ally cheers you on to a peppy soundtrack!

name: Vardia
description: Vardia is a psychological horror and thriller game that immerses players in the 5-night experience of a woman working the night shift as a receptionist and room service attendant at a motel.

name: Touch Your Eyes
description: "Touch Your Eyes" is a puzzle game with a unique approach to pushing boxes. In this game, you will play as a doctor treating various eye patients.

name: The Political Machine 2024
description: Win the hearts and minds of America’s voters and run for President in this political strategy game. Choose a candidate or create your own and run against the opposing party’s candidate or up to 4 primary candidates controlled by the computer or other players online.

name: The Political Machine 2024: Cabinet of Curiosities
description: Dive into the ultimate customization experience with the 'Cabinet of Curiosities' DLC! Outfit your candidate with a wild array of gear, from Drengin heads to astronaut suits. Campaign in style or outlandish flair!

name: The Paupers
description: On a special day, spirits emerge, seeking your assistance for a seamless journey to the beyond. Listen to their requests and gather the essential items to aid their passage into the afterlife. It's your task to cater to the spirits' needs in this mysterious yet delightfully comical journey!

name: Infinity: HexaDome Tactics
description: Pick your champions and fight in merciless 1v1 turn-based matches. Send your fighters in the arena, position them strategically, create synergies and give the crowd a brutal show! Unlock your ultimate attacks, influence the course of the game and dominate The Hexadome!

name: The Detective
description: Step into the shoes of an experienced detective and uncover dark secrets while solving criminal cases. In this thrilling detective world, you'll face stressful decision-making moments, reconstruct crime scenes, and utilize cutting-edge technology for evidence analysis.

name: The Darkened Halls
description: Prepare to face nightmarish bosses in 'The Darkened Halls.' Armed with intellect, not weapons, you are a vulnerable young protagonist hunted by demons. Solve puzzles, secure key items, and challenge powerful foes in a relentless pursuit.

name: The Ampoule
description: A drug leak during an unknown experiment turned scientists into monsters. You are tasked with finding a cure to escape the monster and returning them to their original form. Only you can save the world in "The ampoule."

name: Sword n' Dragons
description: fantasy boss fight, arcade dynamic gameplay, roguelite vibes. breathtaking action in some epic combat against giant monsters all over the way !!

name: Rutabaga Desert Storm
description: Lead the vegetable revolution alone or with a friend in the side-scrolling shoot ‘em up Rutabaga Desert Storm! Take down wave after wave of enemies, dodge their projectiles, and grab power-ups to boost your destruction! Can you defeat the oppressive humans and free the proletariat vegetable masses?

name: Run Pizza Run
description: Do you like challenges? Then this game is for you! Manage a delivery man and deliver all the pizzas to the address. But remember, it won't be easy. Good luck!

name: Rogue Tides
description: Set sail on a dangerous adventure! Crush unrelenting waves of enemies and build your ship! Challenge hard bosses, each with their own unique challenges! Can you stand the tides? Will you sink or swim?

name: Rodent Retribution
description: Take on the role of a battle-hardened feline on a mission to eliminate a ruthless rat infestation in the underground world. Armed with powerful weaponry and cat-like agility, embark on a relentless journey through breathtaking subterranean environments in your quest for vengeance.

name: Rhythm Producer
description: Rhythm Producer is a rhythm game where players take on the role of a game producer and use four different rhythm game mechanics to complete a series of levels in art, programming, debugging, and review and release. Ultimately, they create a game within the game.

name: Sex in Space
description: Sex in Space is an enthralling adult visual novel adventure, placing you in Captain Nikolai Kovak's shoes, responsible for the spaceship. Your choices will shape the destiny of the crew as they contend with a perplexing temporal conundrum.

name: Steel Flood
description: Explore a fallen utopia in this action-packed adventure platformer. Harness the weather to find new paths. Fight the untamed machines and seek ways to get their fragile parts for crafting. Become the savior of humanity or its doom.

name: Stomping Grounds
description: Enter the Stomping Grounds! A silly multiplayer party brawler where your body is your only weapon. Gain victory by hurling yourself at your enemies and laying waste to the level one ground-pound at a time. But watch your step! With fully destructible levels, no two stages are ever the same.

name: Subzero Tides
description: Subzero Tides is a sci-fi colony builder set on Europa moon. Build a self-sustaining colony, harness geothermal vents for power and manage colonists. Experience a compelling blend of exploration, survival, and strategic decision-making.

name: SpaceFront
description: SpaceFront is a dynamic roguelike real-time strategy. Control Corgis and defend the galaxy from soviet invasion! No campaign will be the same thanks to procedurally generated maps, random artifacts, different units and abilities! Join the effort, join the SpaceFront!

name: Simon the Seahorse The Animated Adventure Game
description: Travel to 13 Locations around the world! Face challenging obstacles! Hours of Fun Gameplay! Help Simon save his friends!!

name: Shaylushay Treasure Expedition
description: Join everyone's beloved blue cat-mushroom Shaylushay in his adventure into the depths of the mysterious Cave!

name: New Earth
description: This visual novel contains a lot of sexual scenes. There are many routes. You can have a happy ending (Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Sharing Ending) or a sad ending (Netorare Ending) depending on how you play. As for BDSM & Pregnancy, these kinks are also avoidable like NTR (Netorare).

name: Oculant
description: Oculant is a classic retro action adventure platformer in a dark-fantasy world. Travel through the kingdom and discover what lies within the kingdom's dark secret.

name: Phoenix 2
description: A beautiful shoot'em up with daily new missions and 100 ships to collect.

name: Portal Dungeon: Character Pack - Duck
description: In the world of "Portal Dungeon", a mysterious new hero suddenly appeared, and he and his companions were ready to destroy everything.

name: Pretty Girls Escape Plus
description: The "Plus" version is now available in the game "Pretty Girls Escape"! Slide the blocks left and right in the stage to connect and then erase them, and guide the characters to the exit! Collect costumes of 9 beautiful girls from idol groups, athletics clubs, and more, and have fun dressing them up!

name: Project Coreward
description: Embark on an open world journey across the stars while encountering foes, friends and forgotten stories. Build your ship. Recruit and train your crew. Most of all, explore and confront the unknown to reveal the true, vast nature of choice and consequence.

name: Pteranodon 2: Primal Island
description: Get ready for an epic journey back in time with Pteranodon 2: Primal Island! In this thrilling sequel, the spear throwing action continues with an all-new story mode that takes you on a wild ride through prehistoric landscapes filled with danger and wonder!

name: Rave Gazebo
description: Rave Gazebo is a dance-interactive album. Flail your arms wildly and see the sound and environment respond to your gestures. Experience visuals impossible to see outside of VR! You are in control.

name: Indomitable Blade
description: Indomitable Blade is a classic turn-based Strategy RPG where you command the knights of the fallen kingdom. It tells a human drama of people stripped of their myths and pride, yet struggling fiercely to live on. Gather allies, make decisions, and harness strategy to challenge a brutal destiny.

name: Jax: History Repeats Itself
description: Jax: History Repeats Itself is an exciting horror game. Inspired by other animatronic-mascot-horror games, this game follows the story of Ernel, a young man hired as a security guard, and his adventure throughout his mandatory 5 nights at Jax's Burgers.

name: Happy Bird Day
description: Quickly call your friend to play Happy Bird Day. Complete together levels full of surprises and fun physics. Play as pigeons or sparrows, or whatever those birds are. Overcome space and time, have fun and enjoy. P.S. Don't forget to find the seeds and carry them all the way to the end.

name: Kinky Cosplay Heroes
description: Start your own sexy club, filling your staff with cute anime girls. Flirt with the girls, win their hearts, dress them up in the cutest outfits... And have fun with them in various sex scenes, all the while your business grows even while you are away.

name: Hues of the Void
description: A dark, eldritch defense game, involving color matching and minion management! Can YOU stave off the Chromacrusade?

name: Gin: The Silver Wind
description: Gin - The Silver Wind is a 2D Retro inspired video game that features its own take on classic controls seen in games from the late 80s and early 90s. Take control of Gin and plan your jumps with precision as you wind through stages filled with tight platforming sections and deadly hazards!

name: Gestalt: The Fifth Day
description: Wickeina 'Wicke' Gestalt lives in a haunted house. Trying to balance the stresses of life with the horrors of her home, play through a point-and-click psychological horror and multiple scenarios, where success and failure both progress the narrative of her story.

name: Gemstone Puzzle Fury: Expansion Pack
description: Prepare for an exhilarating journey with Gemstone Puzzle Fury's latest expansion pack. This expansion takes precision and strategy to the next level.

name: Frontline 1942: Battles of the World War 2
description: Immerse yourself in the times of World War II and become a real hero! Shoot, capture, win – the path to glory is paved with shells!

name: Fallen Angels
description: This casual game combines two major elements: "plot" and "match-three strategy." In this game, players not only get to experience the classic match-three gameplay, achieving goals by eliminating identical elements, but also delve deep into various plot sub-stories with the goddesses in each level.

name: False Hero
description: False Hero is a fast-paced soulslike adventure with a unique ability system, imaginative setting, and gripping soundtrack. All lands have fallen to Death and been corrupted beyond repair. Let them live on or destroy them once and for all.

name: KurOba
description: KurOba, Selçuklu'dan Osmanlı'ya uzanan bir strateji oyunu. Medeniyetleri yönet, kaynakları kullan, tarihî olayları deneyimle ve savaş. Geleceğe yönlendir, kaynakları sürdürülebilir kullan. Tarihi bir yolculuk!

name: Kidbash: Super Legend
description: Kidbash: Super Legend is an exciting 2D platformer that blends classic gaming with a modern touch. You'll go on a thrilling adventure through two different phases - the Mountain and the Village. Your goal is to defeat Tao Shen Long, and begin the journey to becoming a Super Legendary Hero.

name: Elves vs. Goblins Mahjongg World
description: Darkness descends upon the land of elves and goblins. Black clouds of smoke rise from the deep fiery maw of the volcano at Sparkle Mountain. They spread and with them gloom and cruel curses ...

name: Echoes of Fear
description: Solve clues left by the valley's previous inhabitants to determine the location of the Artifact. Your task is simple. Get in, get the artifact, and get out.. Alive.

name: Conjury
description: Collect cards, weapons, and items as you make your way through this fast-paced deck building rogue-like to escape the eternal darkness of Lumtham woods.
